Alida G. has survived both Katrina and a debilitating medical condition, and is ready to get off of social security disability benefits. “Before I was disabled, I had really good credit.  I could walk into any bank and get a loan for anything. When they put me on that medicine, I lost everything – my house, everything.” The medicine made it hard for her to think. Recently, her diagnosis was changed, along with her treatment. “I’m feeling so much better… I’m ready to get on with my life.  I’m tired of being poor.”

Alida will use the loan to pay for the first three months of booth rentals, along with her equipment.  She plans to stock up on food and to buy a couple freezers, a nacho machine, a generator, ice chests, and a barbeque grill for cooking up hotdogs and ravioli and hamburgers. She’ll sell “snowballs, of course” but she’s really excited about the grilled ravioli. “They’re very good – and it’s unique! They’re definitely on the menu.” She will also buy a fan to cool the tent in the summer and to keep the smoke out of the tent.  

If not for this loan, Alida says she would probably sell her truck and other belongings in order to fund her business, or she might not have the funds to start it at all. 

She really wants to be financially independent. “The profit margin on a snowball stand is so large that if you fail, there’s something wrong with you.  As long as you’re frugal, this is the way to go.  Everyone I’ve talked to who’s in it has loved it.”  

When she is more stable, Alida wants to get a house loan to make repairs. “We still have storm damage from Katrina. …That’s one of the main reasons I want to get off of social security. I want homeowners insurance so I don’t have to go through this again.”

Alida also has a clear vision for her business. “In five years, I’d like to have five more permanent locations somewhere.  ...  In 20 years, I want to be all across the gulf coast and start working my way up the east coast.” Eventually she wants to “take the main office location and turn it into an ice park.  It’s going to have a massive tube ride.  … and it’ll be landscaped, with nothing but pine trees with the snow on them. … I’ll set areas aside for handicapped kids.  And things to help save the glaciers – little educational things. And ice rinks and swimming pools.  It’ll be just like visiting somewhere up north in the winter, only in the south.”

Alida is trying to figure out how to legally hire her roommate (also pictured in the photo), who is also disabled and currently helping with the business.  Her roommate is her co-borrower on the loan.

Her advice to other people starting a business is “don’t give up. And get everything in writing, no matter who you’re dealing with.”

loans.use: First three months of booth rentals, a tent, a couple of freezers, a charcoal-gas barbeque grill, a nacho machine, a generator, ice chests, a fan, and food to sell. Possibly other equipment or supplies.

loans.name: Meile Yirabel

texts.es:
Meile de 27 años, es madre soltera con dos hijos de 7 y 5 años vive en una casa de caña y tiene una pequeña tienda ubicada en la parte delantera de su casa ubicada  en una zona periurbana ubicado en la Perimetral de Guayaquil zona rodeada de un estero.

Debido a que se caso muy joven y su situación económica no era tan buena hace dos años invirtió  sus ahorros con la idea de tener su propio negocio. Comenzaron la tienda con algunos víveres y a pasar más tiempo con sus dos hijos. En la actualidad tiene en su tienda con lácteos, granos, bebidas, arroz etc. Trabaja desde las 06h00am hasta las 22h00pm.  Con el préstamo quiere comprar  cemento, bloques para construir unas paredes de su casa y hacerla más segura para sus hijos. 

En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y tener una tienda más grande para asegurar el futuro de su familia.
texts.en:
Meile is 27 years old.  She is a single mother and has two children aged 7 and 5.  She lives in a cane house and has a small store in the front of her home which is located in a peri-urban area in Perimetral de Guayaquil which is surrounded by a salt marsh.

Owing to the fact that she married at a very young age and her financial situation wasn't so good, two years ago she invested her savings in having her own business.  She started her store with a few groceries so that she could spend more time with her two children.  She now has a store where she sells dairy products, grains, drinks, rice, etc.  She works from 6.00am to 10.00pm.  She would like to use her loan to buy cement and blocks to re-build some of the walls of her house and make it more safe for her children.

In the future, she would like to finish building her house and have a bigger store so that she can guarantee her family's future.

loans.use: To buy cement and blocks

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ana es madre soltera con tres hijos ya mayores de edad. Ella vende almuerzos en las tarde por $ 1.50. Vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Comenzó vendiendo comidas con algunos ahorros y la experiencia que tenía en vender comidas decidió tener su propio negocio de almuerzos. Por esa buena decisión ahora tiene su pequeño comedor en la parte delantera de su casa donde trabaja todos los días desde las 06h00am hasta que se acaben los almuerzos. El almuerzo viene con jugo, sopa, segundo por solo $ 1.50. 

Ella quiere continuar con su negocio por eso ella quiere comprar con el préstamo arroz, vegetales, legumbres para hacer los almuerzos. En el futuro quiere ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is a single mother with three grown-up children.  She sells lunches in the afternoons for $1.50.  She lives in a peri-urban area on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran which is known for its deteriorating ecosystem.

Ana began selling meals with some savings she had and her previous experience in the business.  She decided to set up her own lunch business.  Owing to this good decision, she now has her own small eatery in the front of her home where she works every day from 6.00am until her lunches have run out.  Her lunches come with juice, soup and main course for only $1.50.

Ana would like to continue with her business and will use her loan to buy rice, vegetables and pulses to make her lunches.  In the future, she would like to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy rice, vegetables and pulses

loans.name: Reina Luz

texts.es:
la señora Reina Luz S. S. tiene 52 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos nietos que dependen de ella,  ya que el papa de ellos fallecio.
doña Reina Luz vive en el barrio Buenos Aires de San Lorenzo, tiene casa propia  y se dedica al comercio, vende lacteos como ser queso, quesillo y mantequilla, tiene dos puestos en donde vende dichos productos.
doña Reina es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora con muchos deseos de superacion.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lacteos y bolsas plasticas.
el sueño de doña Reina Luz es que sus dos negocios sean los mejores de la zona y que sus ventas se mejoren porque estan malas en estos momentos, pero con la epoca de navidad las cosas mejoran.
texts.en:
Reina Luz S. S. is 52 years old and married.  She has two grandchildren who are dependent upon her because their father died.

Reina Luz lives in her own house in the Buenos Aires de San Lorenzo neighborhood.  She sells dairy products like cheese, fresh cheese, and butter.  She has two stands where she sells said products.

Reina is a very hard-working and enterprising woman with a strong drive for self-improvement.  She will use the loan to buy dairy products and plastic bags.

Reina Luz’s dreams are that her two businesses become the best in the zone and that her sales improve.  Sales are now bad, but with the Christmas season they will improve.

loans.use: To buy cheese, fresh cheese, butter, and plastic bags

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 40 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 10 años que posee una tienda, instalada en el interior de su casa, desde entonces atiende todas las mañanas, en ocasiones sus hijos la apoyan en la atención hacia los clientes. Procura siempre que su establecimiento este surtido con diversos productos, de esa manera logra captar más clientes. Ella considera que gracias a este negocio pudo mantenerse estable económicamente y ayudar a su esposo con el sustento de los hijos. Ahora su prioridad es ampliar su tienda, para implementar más productos como frutas y artículos de oficina, que sean productos que estén al alcance de la economía de sus clientes. Es su crédito número 9 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería en productos de primera necesidad para su tienda.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 40, lives with her husband and their three children in her own house.  She has had a store, which is set up in her house, for ten years.  She tends to her store every morning, and her children occasionally help her wait on the customers.  She always tries to make sure that her establishment is stocked with diverse products.  This is the way that she manages to get more customers.

Thanks to this business she was able to keep herself financially stable and help her husband support the children.  Her priority now is to expand the store.  She will do this in order to carry more products like fruit and office products.  These are products that are within the financial reach of her customers.

This is her ninth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support.  It pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.  She is grateful to all of the people who will be the lenders of the loan she is requesting.  The loan will be very useful to the progress of her business.  She will use the requested loan to buy more basic needs products for her store.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
El Sr. Ernesto tiene 57 años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Zulema Nelly Araujo  de 50 años de edad,  llevan 30 años juntos y tienen 4 hijos una en edad escolar y los otros ya formaron su propia familia.
     El Sr. Ernesto desde joven trabajó con su hermano  como constructor en  la Argentina.  Con su ahorro de 19 años en la pudo comprar todas las herramientas necesarias para volver y trabaja en su país como profesional independiente, hoy día prácticamente es el uno de los mejores constructores de la zona.
    Solicita el préstamo para la compra de herramienta  (Mezcladora de cemento, arena, tierra y otros para la construcción).
texts.en:
Ernesto, age 57, is married to 50 year old Zulema Nelly Araujo.  They have been together for 30 years, and they have four children.  One child is school age, and the others have formed their own families.

Starting when he was young, Ernesto worked with his brother as a builder in Argentina.  With his savings of 19 years he was able to buy all of the necessary tools to return and work in his country as an independent professional.  Now he is virtually one of the best builders in the zone.

He is requesting the loan to buy tools (cement mixer, sand, soil, and others for construction).

loans.use: To buy a cement mixer

loans.name: Dorila De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Dorila de 53 años, es madre soltera con un hijo de 14 años. Vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Inicio su negocio comprando pocos productos para poder mantener a su hijo ya que está separada. Poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación pudo invertir dinero en arroz, enlatados, bebidas para tener más variedad en sus ventas. En la actualidad trabaja sola desde las 07h00 hasta las 22h00pm. Vende arroz, azúcar, verduras, vegetales granos etc. 

Aunque no tiene a su cónyuge ella quiere seguir trabajando para darle una mejor vida a su hijo, comprando con el préstamo enlatados, arroz, bebidas, dulces para su tienda. En el futuro quiere tener un minimarket para así que su hijo tengan una mejor situación económica.
texts.en:
Dorila is 53 years old. She is a single mother with a 14-year-old child, living in a peripheral suburb on the outskirts of Guayaquil called Duran, characterized by its disappearing ecosystem.

She started her business by buying a few products so she could raise her child, as she is separated. Little by little with hard work and dedication she was able to invest in rice, canned goods and drinks to offer more variety in her sales. She currently works alone from 7 am until 10 pm. She sells rice, sugar, vegetables, grain cereals, etc.

Although she is separated from her spouse she wants to continue working to provide a better life for her son. With the loan she will buy canned goods, rice, drinks, sweets for her store. In the future she wants to operate a minimarket so that her child can benefit from a better economic situation.

loans.use: Canned goods, rice, drinks, sweets

loans.name: Francisca Sugey

texts.es:
la señora Francisca Sugey García tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera y se dedica a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar.
Francisca es madre de tres hijos que depènden de ella y el papa les ayuda pero pero no vive con ellos, doña Francisca le a tocado dificil ser padre y madre a la vez pero con su valentia a podido salir adelante, ademas los fines de semana y por las noches se dedica a cortar pelo, arregla uñas, aplicar tintes y demas cosas que necesita una mujer para lucir bella.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos y refrescos para vender un poco mas y
lograr de esa manera mas utilidades,  sus clientes la prefieren a por su carisma, atencion y amabilidad con que trata a las personas.
 
su deseo es encontrase un buen hombre que la haga feliz a ella y a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Francisca Sugey García is 31 years old. She is a single mother and sells family grocery basket products.  

Francisca is a mother of three children who depend on her. Their father helps them but does not live with them. It has been difficult for Francisca to be both mother and father at the same time, but with her courage she has been able to get ahead. On weekends and eveneings she cuts hair, does nails, dyes hair, and other things that a woman needs to look pretty.  
 
She will use the loan to buy groceries, basic grains and beverages to sell a little more and make more profit. Her customers prefer her because of her charisma, her service and the friendliness she treats people with. 
 
She wants to find a good man who will make her and her children happy.

loans.use: To buy sugar, coffee, beans, rice, lard, oil, eggs, pasta, margarine, soup, tooth paste, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, candles, matches, pills, bug spray, batteries, beverages, and churros.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Eight years ago, Emma G. started selling jewelry out of her husband’s shop as a hobby. “Of course, all women like jewelry, you know?  I found it interesting.” She found that the jewelry sold well, so she decided "to get a space, put up showcases, and the whole works.” She called her shop "Kary's Corner."

Now that she’s divorced, however, the business is vital. “I’ve been supporting my house and my three kids with this little business. I depend on this 100%.  So I have to make this work.  It’s not something I do for fun anymore.  It’s something that I live out of.”  Emma is supporting two teenagers at home and one in college.

Emma wants this loan so she can go to California to buy some silver jewelry.  “Right now, what’s selling the most is silver, more than gold, mostly because gold has gone up in price so much …So I’m investing in silver jewelry for the holidays.”

Emma is most proud of her repeat customers, “People who know me and …[know] they can trust me to get stuff that they like. …My customers who keep coming back and who’ve been with me for a long time.”

So customer service is very important. “I respect my customers as much as I possibly can.  If I keep them happy, they’ll keep coming.  …If they have any doubts, I make every effort to make them comfortable with what they’re buying.  … These are good metals… They’re not going to lose their value, and in the long run, it’s an investment.”

Emma hopes to stop renting at some point.  “I’m probably dreaming too much, but that would be my ultimate dream; to have my own building and have someone there who can build the jewelry I design.”

Because jewelry is a luxury, not a necessity, Emma says it has been a challenge to keep her business going. “I’ve been happy that I’ve been able to continue my business with this economy and everything that’s been going on.”  And the economy is not going to stop her.  “I’m not a quitter, and I’m not about to let this business go down because I’ve been there before.  This is what my kids depend on, what I depend on. [Without this loan] I probably would have to sell my car or my personal jewelry or something.”

“It’s been hard, but it’s not impossible.  You just have to give it all you got.”

loans.use: To buy inventory, especially silver jewelry, to sell during the holiday season

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es: Lisbeth tiene 26 años, vive con su madre y su hijo en casa de su madre. Desde hace 1 año se dedica a la venta de objetos artesanales, que ella misma elabora, su madre la ayuda en la elaboración de estos objetos y una vez terminado todo el trabajo, son llevados al mercado artesanal de la ciudad de Lima, que es ahí donde recibe buena paga por el trabajo que elabora. Su producción artesanal tiene mucha demanda y por eso tiene ventas exitosas con frecuencia, además de pedidos por el cual necesita de manos para poder terminar con el trabajo a tiempo. Considera que su trabajo le es rentable, ya que logra recuperar todo lo invertido, además que es un trabajo que la independiza y eso le hace sentir bien. En adelante su deseo es incrementar su producción. Es el crédito número 4 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para implementar su taller y pueda elaborar más objetos artesanales.
texts.en: Lisbeth is 26 years old. She lives with her mother and son in her mother's house. She has sold artisanal objects for a year. She makes them herself, and her mother helps her. Once they are completely finished, they are taken to the artisanal market in Lima, where she receives good pay for her work. Her artisanal production is much in demand and that is why she frequenty has successful sales. She also fills orders for which she needs extra hands to finish the work on time. She considers her work to be profitable, since she recoups everything she has invested. In addition, the work gives her independence and this makes her feel good. In the future, she wishes to increase her production. This is loan number 4 with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support and she also likes being part of her communal bank because all of its members are responsible and very supportive people. She is grateful to all of the people who will be making the loan she is asking for and it will be very useful in her business' progress. With the loan she is asking for, she will invest in buying materials to outfit her workshop and make more artisanal objects.

loans.use: To buy materials to make artisanal objects.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco M. es casado, tiene 47 años de edad, con 7 hijos. Se dedica a la venta ambulante de pescado, dicha actividad viene realizando hace 8 años, pero debido a la veda necesita realizar otra actividad, razón por el cual opta por la fabricación y venta de ladrillos porque en esa actividad tiene mucha experiencia y cuenta con un terreno que es apta para realizar su emprendimiento.

 El Sr. M. comenta que tiene un hijo que le puede ayudar y también recibe apoyo de su hermano que tiene un horno para la quema de  25.000 ladrillos. 

 Cabe destacar que son familias muy humildes, pero cuenta con diversas actividades, ya sea en la cría de conejos, gallinas y otros animales, los cuales le sirven para consumo u ingresos agregados.

 Él tiene como sueño mejorar su casa y apoyar a sus hijos para que puedan culminar sus estudios y algún día que sean buenos profesionales.


Solicita el préstamo para la compra de arena y leña para la constrcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Francisco M., age 47, is married and has seven children.  He has been selling fish in an itinerant manner for eight years.  However, due to the end of the season, he needs to carry out another business activity.  That is why he has chosen making and selling bricks.  He has a lot of experience in this business, and he has a piece of land that is suitable for his endeavor.

He has one son who can help him, and he also gets help from his brother who has an oven that burns 25,000 bricks.  It is worth mentioning that they are very humble families.  They have different activities like raising rabbits, chickens, and other animals that serve as food or added income.

His dream is to improve his house and to support his children so that they can finish their education and become good professionals one day. 

He is requesting the loan to buy sand and wood for construction on his house.

loans.use: To buy six loads of sand and wood

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en:
Jesus E. describes himself as an active entrepreneur.  His family has background in carpet cleaning and maintenance, which is why he opened J.M. Carpet Care Sale Installation four years ago.  He employs two other people and, through his business, supports his wife and children.  

Jesus E. says this is the first time he has accessed credit. He will use this loan to increase his publicity, and to have in-hand cash flow for one employee.

In the future, Jesus would like to make enough profits to be able to rely on his business for financial independence.  He would like to get a house, have his own equipment, and eventually buy a bigger company – like a restaurant.  He thinks that will take him about five years.

Jesus E. advises new business owners to really research how businesses work.  He says a lot of people that want to start a business are very excited.  But when they go to open the business, there are a lot of legal processes they’re not aware of.  So he advises them to focus 100% on their business for a good year.  It took him that long to establish a good foundation for his business.

Jesus E. is proud of his knowledge and experience, because it means he can offer the best service to his clients.  He is proud of being professionally independent, and driving his own schedule.

loans.use: Increased publicity and in-hand cash flow for one employee

loans.name: Joel Adolfo

texts.es:
Joel de 55 años, tiene una carnicería. Vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 
 	 
Obtuvo experiencia en una carnicería cuando trabajo hace años atrás para poder tener una situación económica estable. Con algunos ahorros y perseverancia pudo comprar carne suficiente para tener su propio negocio. En la actualidad alquila un local vende la libra de carne a $ 1.80, la liba de chancho a $ 3.00. Con el préstamo quiere comprar carnes para tener más variedad en las ventas. En el futuro quiere abrir distintas sucursales para asegurar la vejez de él y su esposa.
texts.en:
Joel, 55, owns a butcher's shop. He lives in a a periurban area outside of Guayaquil called Duran, which is known for its deteriorating ecosystem.

He gained experinece at a butcher's years ago, when was working towards a stable economic situation. With some savings and perseverance he was able to buy enough meat to set up his own business. He is currently renting premises, where he sells meat at $ 1.80 per pound and pork at $ 3.00 per pound.

With the loan he wants to buy meat so as to sell more variety. In future he wants to open several branches to ensure his old age and his wife's.

loans.use: Meat

loans.name: Lidia Angelica

texts.es:
Lidia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Flores de Vilquechico”  ubicado en el distrito Vilquechico, provincia Huancané y departamento de Puno, tiene 60 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 08 hijos independientes. La señora no tiene estudios.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 meses,  su primer  préstamo solicitado fue de S/. 400.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de artesanías.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de  S/.1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar lana para poder tejer sus ponchos. 
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es  tener más capital para su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Lidia is a member of the "Las Flores de Vilquechico" ("The Flowers of Vilquechico") loan group, based in the district of Vilquechico, province of Huancané, department of Puno. She is 60 years old, married with 8 children, all of whom live independently. She has no formal education. 

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 8 months. Her first loan was for 400 soles, which she used to increase the capital of her craft selling business. She is now requesting a new loan of 1,000 soles to buy wool to weave ponchos with.

Her dream for the future is to have more capital for her business. What she likes the most about the loan group are the meetings and the training sessions.

loans.use: Buy wool to make ponchos.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es:
El Sr. Jacinto B. es casado, tiene 64 años de edad, con 4 hijos, todos trabajan y no dependen económicamente de él. Su lavadero montó hace mas de 9 años, pues anteriormente se dedicaba al macate y con ello juntó un pequeño capital con el cual realizó su emprendimiento.

 Es un señor muy activo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y sus hijos, además le ayuda en su trabajo un sobrino a quien le tiene mucha confianza.

 El crédito que solicita es para comprar un motor de mayor capacidad ya que se aproxima el verano y en esa temporada tiene más demanda y espera que todos sus clientes salgan con la satisfacción esperada.

 Él necesita mejorar sus ingresos debido a que no tiene jubilación y la única forma de solventar sus gastos es gracias a los ingresos que tiene en el lavadero.
texts.en:
Jacinto B. (64) is married with 4 children, all of whom work and do not financially depend on him. He set up a laundry over 9 years ago. He previously worked as street vendor, which enabled him to gather a small capital that he used to start his own business.

He is very active and has the support of his wife and children. A nephew, whom he trusts, also helps him with his work. 

He requests a loan to buy a larger engine because summer, which is the season with the highest demand, is approaching, and he hopes to provide his customers with a satisfactory service.

He needs to improve his income because he does not have a pension and the only way to cover his outgoings is through the income generated by the laundry.

loans.use: Buy an engine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase platforms for his business

loans.name: Waleska Yamileth

texts.es:
la sra. Waleska Yamileth G. V. tiene 35 años de edad, esta casada y tiene una hija que depende de ella y de su esposo,  tienen casa propia y viven muy bonito.
Waleska tiene de vivir en San Lorenzo mas de 32 años,  crecio con sus padres y a la edad de 18 años se caso y se separo de ellos logrando tener su propio hogar y desde entonces comenzo a dedicarse a vender charamuscas, paletas de leche, ropa nueva. En la actualidad vende productos lacteos como ser: queso, quesillo, mantequilla. su esposo es albañil y el a construido la casa en donde actualmente viven, se han ahorrado mucho dinero en mano de obra.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de queso, mantequilla y quesillo.
su sueño es que su hija que tiene 16 años se gradue del colegio y siga estudiando en la universidad.
texts.en:
Mrs Waleska Yamileth G. Velazquez is 35 years old.  She is married and has a daughter who depends on her and her husband.  They have their own home and they live very nicely.

Waleska has lived in San Lorenzo for 32 years.  She grew up with her parents and at the age of 18 she got married and left her parents' home to set up her own household.  Since then she has worked selling candy twists, milk lollipops and new clothes.  She currently sells dairy products such as cheese, 'quesillo' (a soft cheese popular in Central America) and butter.  Her husband is a builder and he built the house where they currently live.  They saved a lot of money by building it themselves.

She will use her loan to buy cheese, butter and 'quesillo'.

Waleska's dream is for her daughter who is 16 years old to graduate from high school and continue studying at university.

loans.use: To buy cheese, 'quesillo' (a soft cheese) and butter

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito de Paucarcolla, provincia de Puno,  departamento  de Puno, tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene cinco  hijos.  Pudo estudiar hasta la secundaria.
Leonor, está trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde  hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles,  dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de gaseosas y golosinas.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo monto de S/ 600.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizará para comprar golosinas y gaseosas de varios sabores.
Su sueño es  seguir adelante con su negocio y generar mayores ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son los préstamos y la solidaridad entre las socias.
texts.en:
Leonor is a member of the Communal Bank "Santiago Apóstol" located in the district of Paucarcolla, province and department of Puno. She is 40 years of age, living in a committed relationship and has five children. She was able to study through middle school. 

Leonor has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for five years. She requested her first loan of 300.00 nuevos soles to invest in her soft drink and candy sales business. 

Now she will request a new loan in the amount of 600.00 nuevos soles which will be used for purchasing candy and soft drinks of various flavors. Her dream is to continue on in her business and generate a greater income. 

What she likes the most about the Communal Bank are the loans and the mutual support among the members.

loans.use: To purchase candy and soft drinks wholesale

loans.name: Giovanni

texts.es:
Giovanni B. F., tiene la edad de 34 años, está casado y tiene 1 hijo que es su mayor prioridad. El quiere comprar unos cerdos para aprovechar la oportunidad que le brinda su suegro de prestarle una porqueriza que tiene desocupada,  cuenta con mucha experiencia ya que siempre ha trabajado en esta actividad. Con ésta opción  puede mejor sus ingresos  y trabajar en su propio negocio y así tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto él como su esposa y su hijo. Piensa en el futuro de su hijo y poderle dar estudios para que en un futuro sea un buen profesional.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Giovanni B. F. is 34 years old.  He is married and has a child who is his main priority.  He would like to buy some pigs to take advantage of the opportunity which his father-in-law is offering him in lending him a pigsty which is standing empty.  He already has a lot of experience since he has always worked in this activity.  With this option he can improve his income and work in his own business and thereby provide a better quality of life for himself, his wife and his son.  He is thinking about his son's future and would like to make sure he is able to study so that he can become a good professional in the future.

This is Giovanni's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has given him this loan on easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es: El Señor Ramiro  comerciante, el  se dedica a la venta de ropa para varones en la actualidad cuenta con tres puestos de venta dos en anticrético y uno en alquiler, sus puestos son muy bien decorados y muy presentables la ubicación estratégica le favorece para la venta sus productos ya que se encuentra en la salida del centro comercial el importa su mercadería de Perú esta semana tiene planeado viajar para abastecerse antes de las  fiestas de fin de año ya que es época  de venta para todos sus productos, para eso solicito el crédito para la compra de mercadería, el entrega también por mayor a clientes que le hacen pedidos, es una persona muy trabajadora de buen carácter, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ramiro is a merchant who sells men's clothing.  He currently has three sales locations: two are leased and one is rented.  His stores are well decorated and presentable.  They are in a strategic location near the commercial center which helps sales.  

He imports his merchandise from Peru.  This week is he planning to travel to stock up on merchandise before the holiday season when there is a high volume of sales.  He will also buy in bulk for customers who have placed orders.

He is asking for this loan to purchase merchandise for his stores.  He is a very hard working person with a good character.  

He is thankful to this institution for the support they have given him.

loans.use: Purchase men's clothing

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is married with two grown children. She lives in Novaya Kahovka and has a small business selling souvenirs. Victoria has several vending locations at the markets and in the local mall, called “Tsentralnyi” (“Central”). Presently, Victoria has about 17,000 Grivnas in capital turnover. Her net profit amounts to 6,000 Grivnas. 

Victoria is seeking a 15,000 Grivnas loan to purchase additional merchandise to diversify her assortment. She has been in this business for 8 years. She knows how to please her customers and meet their needs. Victoria enjoys working with people and this type of merchandise. She is hoping to see her business expand and flourish in the future as well.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Leonor Marta

texts.es:
Leonor es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras”  ubicado en el distrito Cabanilla,  provincia de Lampa y departamento de Puno, tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil  casada y tiene 02 hijos independientes, la señora estudió educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 03 años,  nos cuenta que su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de artículos de joyería y misturas.

Con éste crédito de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, comprará joyas al por mayor.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener más capital y mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y los encuentros deportivos.
texts.en:
Leonor is a member of the Communal bank "Mujeres Triunfadoras" [Triumphant Women] located in the district of Cabanilla, province of Lampa and department of Puno. She is 49 years of age, married and has two independent children. She studied up to middle school. 

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three years. She tells us that her initial loan was for 300.00 nuevos soles which she used to increase her business's capital. She sells jewelry and combination items. 

With this loan of 1,000 nuevos soles she will buy jewelry wholesale. 

Her dream for the future is to have more capital and improve her business. 

What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the meetings and the sporting events.

loans.use: To purchase jewelry wholesale

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz tiene 51 años, vive al lado de su hija en su casa propia. Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la crianza de animales, en donde tiene becerros y cerdos, que luego de un tiempo vende la cría de cerdos, ya que son muy cotizados en el mercado a cambio recibe buenas ganancias. Su hija la ayuda en el negocio así como en la crianza de estos animales. Paralelamente a esta actividad también se dedica en la venta de comida en la feria comercial de su zona. La venta de animales le ha resultado beneficiosa ya que ha aumentado su capital y con la ganancias lo invierte en la siembra de algunas verduras como alfalfa y maíz, por tal razón continuará con la venta de animales menores con la meta firme de tener más capital. Es el crédito número 6 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas  responsables y muy solidarias. Asimismo agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará más cerdos.
texts.en:
Luz is 51 years old and lives with her daughter in her own house.  For the last 10 years, she has raised animals, including calves and pigs.  She recently began selling the pigs, which are very sought-after in the market, so she makes a good profit.  Her daughter helps her raise and sell the animals.  She also sells food in the commercial area in her neighborhood.  

Selling animals has been very beneficial for her and has increased her capital.  With the earnings, she invests in planting vegetables like alfalfa and corn. For this reason, she will continue selling young animals with the goal of earning more income.  

With this loan, she will buy more pigs. This is her sixth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to have a financial support, and she likes being part of her community bank because all of the members are very responsible and supportive.  She is also thankful to all the people who manage the loans because they are very useful in the advancement of her business.

loans.use: Purchase pigs

loans.name: Marjorie Del Rocio

texts.es:
Marjorie de 42 años, tiene dos hijos y su esposo trabaja en una central de llamadas. Vende productos Yambal y Esika (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes) y ropa. 
 
Para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos de la casa ella empezó a trabajar vendiendo productos Yambal y Esika. Poco a poco incremento su cartera de clientes porque trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes desde $ 20.00 hasta $ 50.00 c/u, cremas, ropa Esika. Una de las preocupaciones que tiene es la delincuencia ya que comprar mercadería y la deja en stop. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos Yambal como perfumes, cremas, ropa. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y que su mercadería aumente para vender más.
texts.en:
Marjorie is 42 years of age. She has two children and her husband works in a call center. She sells Yambal and Esika brand products (business which offers enterprising women a chance to get started in independent sales) and clothing. 

In order to help her husband with the household expenses she began working selling Yambal and Esika brand products. Little by little she built her customer base. She begins work very early in the day offering the products to her neighbors and friends. She sells perfumes from $20 to $50 per unit, creams, and Esika clothing. One of her concerns is criminal activity since to buy merchandise it is left at a "stop". 

With the loan she wants to buy Yambal products such as perfumes, creams and clothing. In the future she wants to finish building her house and to have more merchandise in order to sell more.

loans.use: Perfumes, creams, costume jewelry

loans.name: Hilda Marcelina

texts.es:
La Señora. Hilda Z. es socia del banco comunal 14 de Agosto, vive en la comunidad de Cashapata que  pertenece a la parroquia de Zhidmad, en esta parroquia se puede encontrar la paz de la naturaleza debido a que se encuentra rodeada de vegetación natural, su gente en su mayoría se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.
 
Doña Hilda tiene 39 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 18, 15 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo ha terminado de estudiar el colegio, su segunda hija está en quinto curso y su ultimo hijo estudia en la escuela.

La Señora Hilda se dedica a la venta de ganado en su misma comunidad, actividad que la realiza hace varios años, todo el día se dedica al cuidado de los mismos y su esposo después del trabajo también le ayuda al cuidado de los animales, se encuentra tranquila ya que en el negocio le va muy bien.

Es socia de la banca comunal hace 5 años y ahora su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono para el pasto de sus animales. Su meta es  llegar tener un negocio de cerdos.
texts.en:
Ms. Hilda Z. is a member of the Banco Comunal 14 de Agosto (14th August Communal Bank). She lives in the community of Cashapata, located in the parish of Zhidmad. In this parrish one feels in peace with nature, thanks to the natural vegetation that surrounds it, and its inhabitants engage mainly in breeding animals and in agriculture.

Doña Hilda is 39 years old, she is married and has 3 children aged 18, 15 and 5. Her eldest son has completed his school studies, her daughter is attending the last year of high school and the youngest son attends primary school.

Hilda engages in selling livestock in her own community, an activity she has been engaging in for many years. She spends all day taking care of the animals, and also her husband helps her breeding the animals once his job is over. She is serene as the activity is going very well.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years, and she is going to use her new loan to buy manure to feed her animals. Her goal is to breed pigs.

loans.use: To buy manure.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito D. Paucarcolla, provincia D. Puno, departamento Puno, tiene 59 años D. edad, D. estado civil casada, tiene cuatro hijos.  Tiene estudios D. secundaria completa.
La señora trae diferentes productos desD. Desaguadero y Tacna para luego venderlos en la ciudad D. Cusco. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace cinco años, el primer préstamo solicitado que fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles,  le permitió incrementar la mercadería D. su negocio.
Con éste crédito  D. S/ 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprará juguetes para abastecerse en la campaña naviD.ña.  Su negocio lo realiza D. forma ambulatoria.
Su sueño es  tener un puesto fijo en Juliaca y así mejorar sus ventas.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son los meses D. gracia  y la ganancia D. sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Leonor is a member of the Communal Bank "Santiago Apóstol" located in the district of Paucarcolla, province and department of Puno. She is 59 years of age, married and has four children. She finished her studies through middle school. 

She transports various products from Desaguadero and Tacna in order to sell them in the city of Cusco. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for five years. The first loan she took out was for 300.00 nuevos soles which allowed her to expand her line of merchandise. 

With this new loan of 2,000 nuevos soles she will stock up on toys for the Christmas season. She sells her wares as a street vendor. Her dream is to have a stall in Juliaca and thus improve her sales. 

What she likes about the Communal Banks are the grace periods and the interest her savings earn.

loans.use: To buy various kinds of toys

loans.name: María Gertrudis

texts.es:
La Señora. María B. es socia del banco comunal 14 de Agosto, vive en la comunidad de Huaillug que  pertenece a la parroquia de Zhidmad, en esta parroquia se puede encontrar la paz de la naturaleza debido a que se encuentra rodeada de vegetación natural, su gente en su mayoría se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.
 
Doña María se dedica a la venta de helados  hace varios años. También cultivas  hortalizas como: nabo, cebolla, remolacha etc., y sus productos lo vende en el mercado de la feria libre los días martes y viernes. Hace 2 años también  trabaja de empleada domestica y está muy contenta ya que en todas sus actividades le va muy bien.

La Señora. María tiene 34 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos menores de edad  que estudian en el colegio.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años beneficiándose con los créditos en sus negocios. Su nuevo préstamo que realiza lo va a invertir en la compra de abono para sus tierras, semillas y helados para la venta. Su sueño es tener un puesto fijo en la feria libre para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
Ms. María B. is a member of the Banco Comunal 14 de Agosto (14th August Communal Bank). She lives in the community of Cashapata, located in the parish of Zhidmad. In this parish one feels in peace with nature, thanks to the natural vegetation that surrounds it, and its inhabitants engage mainly in breeding animals and in agriculture.

Maria has been engaging in selling ice-creams for various years. She also grows vegetables such as: turnips, onions, beetroot etcetera. She sells her products in the “Feria Libre” market on Tuesdays and Fridays. She has also been working as a maid for the past two years, and she is very happy because all of her activities are going very well.

María is 34 years old, she is married and has 4 young children who are school students.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years, and her activity has benefited from the loans. The new loan she is requesting will be used to buy fertilizers for her lands, seed and ice-creams to sell. She dreams of owing a fixed stand in “Feria Libre” to sell her products.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, seeds and ice-creams.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.en:
Nataliya is a married mother with a 5-year-old child. She and her husband own a business that offers ceremonial services and sells ceremonial inventory. She has been in this business for five years and is very focused and determined. She is grateful for the loans she has received from HOPE Ukraine which have helped her business expansion.

This time, Nataliya is requesting a loan of 11,000 UAH to purchase additional materials for manufacturing funeral wreaths, e.g. artificial flowers, wire and ribbons. The loan will be beneficial for Nataliya’s family business by keeping it competitive and promoting further growth.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making wreaths

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor  es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito de Capachica, provincia de Puno, Departamento de Puno, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y tienen  tres hijos, solo puedo estudiar la primaria pero no la concluyó.
Leonor trabaja vendiendo artesanía y combustible. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace diez años, el primer préstamo solicitado que fue de S/.300. 00 nuevo soles, lo invirtió en la compra de una red para la pesca, actividad que dejó de lado por motivos de cambio de domicilio.
Con éste préstamo de S/  1000.00 nuevo soles, invertirá en su negocio comprando combustible.
Su sueño  es seguir y crecer en su negocio.  Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Leonor is a member of the community bank "San Salvador", located in the Capachica district in the province of Puno and department of Puno.  She is 39 years old, married, and has three children.  She was only able to go to primary school, but she didn't finish.

Leonor sells crafts and fuel.  She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 10 years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevo soles, which she invested in a fishing net.  She stopped this activity when she moved.  

She is asking for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to invest in the purchase of fuel.  

Her dream is to continue and grow her business.  The thing she likes best about her community bank is the ease of getting a loan.

loans.use: Purchase fuel.

loans.name: Leonarda Victoria

texts.es:
Leonarda es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito de Paucarcolla, provincia de Puno, departamento de Puno, tiene 43 años de edad, está  casada y tiene  cuatro hijos.  Estudió hasta la secundaria (completa).
Leonarda viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años, el primer préstamo solicitado que fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, le permitió incrementar la mercadería de su negocio, negocio que consistente en la venta de abarrotes. 
Con éste crédito  de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, comprará gaseosas, azúcar, arroz, golosinas y otros al por mayor.
Su sueño es seguir adelante  con  su negocio y ser mayorista.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la comprensión que encuentra entre las demás socias.
texts.en:
Leonarda is a member of the Communal Bank "Santiago Apóstol" located in the district of Paucarcolla, province and department of Puno. She is 43 years old, married and has four children. She finished her studies through middle school. 

Leonarda has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for eight years. Her first loan of 300.00 nuevos soles allowed her to increase the amount of merchandise in her business which consists of selling groceries. 

With this loan for 500.00 nuevos soles she will purchase soft drinks, sugar, rice, candy and other items wholesale. 

Her dream is to continue on with her business and to be a wholesaler. 

What she likes about the Communal Bank is the understanding she finds among the other members.

loans.use: To purchase soft drinks, candies and other grocery items wholesale

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis de 33 años, tiene un hijo y está casado con ayuda de su esposa tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en la parte delantera de su casa ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución.
 
El hace años atrás comenzó a buscar una actividad para poder mantener a su familia. En busca de una actividad económica él vio que la venta de víveres era rentable y podía pasar tiempo con su hijo y esposa. Con unos ahorros compro arroz, azúcar, bebidas y readecuo la parte delantera de su casa para vender con más eficacia los víveres. En la actualidad el tiene una pequeña tienda surtida, vende arroz, aceites, bebidas, lácteos etc. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm todos los días.
 
Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, aceites, bebidas para su tienda y así poderla surtir. En el futuro quiere agrandar su negocio y poder así asegurar el futuro de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis, 33, has a son and is married. He and his wife have a small supply shop in the front part of their house located on the outskirts of Guayaquil in a place called Duran characterized by its deteriorating ecology. 

Some years ago he began looking for a business that would allow him to support his family. In search of a business he saw that grocery sales were profitable and he would be able to spend time with his wife and child. With some savings he bought rice, sugar and drinks and remodeled the front portion of her house into a retail store. Currently he has stocked a small store with rice, oils, drinks, dairy products, etc. He works from 7 a.m. until 10 p.m. seven days a week. 

With the loan he wishes to buy rice, oil and drinks for his business and thus be able to stock it. In the future he wants to expand her business and thus be able to ensure the future of his family.

loans.use: To purchase rice, oil

loans.name: Nancy Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora Nancy B. es socia del banco comunal 14 de Agosto, vive en la comunidad de Cashapata que  pertenece a la parroquia de Zhidmad, en esta parroquia se puede encontrar la paz de la naturaleza debido a que se encuentra rodeada de vegetación natural, su gente en su mayoría se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura.
 
Nuestra socia tiene 28 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos  de 12, 9, 7 y 6 años de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en una escuela de la comunidad. su esposo es de profesión albañil.

Doña Nancy se dedica a la venta de animales como son cerdos, cuyes y gallinas a  los que los vende en su propia comunidad, esta labor la realiza hace varios años y le ha permito ayudar a la economía de su hogar, pero tiene mucha dificultad en la compra del alimento para sus animales debido que es muy caro.

Es socia de la banca comunal hace 5 años y fue su mamá quien la invito a formar parte de este grupo. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de alimento para sus animales y también va a comprar más cuyes. Su meta es poner una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Ms. Nancy B. is a member of the Banco Comunal 14 de Agosto (14th August Communal Bank). She lives in the community of Cashapata, located in the parish of Zhidmad. In this parish one feels in peace with nature, thanks to the natural vegetation that surrounds it, and its inhabitants engage mainly in breeding animals and in agriculture.

She is 28 years old, she is married and has 4 children aged 12, 9, and 6. All of her children attend a school in the community; her husband is a mason.
Nancy engages in selling animals such as pigs, “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig), and chickens, and she sells them in her own community.

She has been engaging in this activity for various years, and this has allowed her to help supporting the economy of her family, buy she finds it difficult to buy food for her animals because it is very expensive.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years, and it was her mother who invited her to become a member of this group. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy food for her animals as well as more cuyes. Her goal is to establish a shop in her house.

loans.use: To buy cueys (Guinea pigs) and food for her animals.

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal "SOL NACIENTE"; la socia vive en el distrito D. Huanchac,  provincia D. Cusco, departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Natividad: ella tiene 44 años D. edad ella es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos;  la socia se dedica a la fabricación D. chompas, mantas, guantes, chalinas, ponchos, chalecos D. alpaca, la socia compra las lanas al por mayor y en todo color y las elabora en su casa D. forma independiente; La socia  desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. lanas D. alpaca. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lanas D. alpaca.

Los otros socios se dedican a comercio minorista, otros hacen taxi en sus unidades vehiculares, a la compra y venta D. accesorios para celulares,  venta D. comida, venta D. productos D. belleza.

La socia agradece el préstamo que se le otorgará y se compromete a seguir trabajando con mucho ahincó para cumplir con los pagos y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Natividad is a member of the community bank "Sol Naciente", located in the Huanchac district, province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.  She is 44 years old, married, and has four children.  

She makes sweaters, blankets, gloves, scarves, ponchos, and vests from alpaca wool.  She buys wool at wholesale prices in all colors and makes the items at home.  She is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of alpaca wool.  

The other members of the group work in retail, drive taxis, buy and sell cell phone accessories, sell food, and sell beauty products.

Natividad is thankful for this loan and she promises to continue working hard to make her payments and improve her business.

loans.use: Purchase alpaca wool

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is married and has a teenage son. She is an entrepreneur from Beregovo where she sells children’s clothing in the local market called “Image”.

Irina is very customer-friendly and polite with all of her clients. She has been in this business for six years. Currently, Irina has 25,000 UAH in inventory and her profit amounts to about $790 a month.

Irina is requesting a 4,000 UAH loan to purchase additional merchandise. Her business is constantly growing and she can hardly handle the high demand she’s facing now. She realizes that lending services are very helpful to her business, as loans allow her to increase her turnover capital and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Roselfina

texts.es: Roselfina tiene 29 años de edad, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 5 años trabaja en las tareas del campo, ella es una emergente agricultora y ganadera, posee vacas y una granja de cuyes, a lo que cuida todas las mañanas, alimentándolos y limpiando su granja. Para ella es muy importante que estos animales tengan el peso exacto, de eso depende para que los pueda vender rápidamente. Por otro lado, la leche que extrae de su vaca, es vendida,  de esa manera obtiene ingresos adicionales. Asimismo cuida de sus cultivos de alfalfa, ya que este producto sirve de forraje para sus animales. Por ahora su prioridad es ampliar la granja de cuyes. Es su crédito número 9 que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Asimismo agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para sembrar alfalfa y maíz,  así como también en la compra de un toro.
texts.en:
Roselfina is 29 years of age and lives with her husband and three children in her own home. She has been working in rural activities for five years and is an emerging crop and livestock farmer. She owns cattle and a guinea pig farm which she tends to every morning, feeding the animals and cleaning their farm. She considers it very important that these animals have the exact weight so that she will be able to sell them quickly. In addition, the milk she derives from her cattle is sold and in this way she earns an additional income. Likewise she also looks after her alfalfa crops since this product is used as forage for her animals. 

Right now her priority is to expand the guinea pig farm. This is her ninth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support and she also appreciates being part of her communal bank since all the members are responsible and mutually supportive persons. She also thanks all the people who will be originators of the loan she seeks as it will be very useful to her in the development of her business. 

She will invest this loan in the purchase of bags of fertilizer for planting alfalfa and corn as well as for the purchase of a bull.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer for her corn and alfalfa crops. She would also like to buy a bull.

loans.name: Leonarda Avelina

texts.es:
Leonarda es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito D. Paucarcolla, provincia D. Puno, departamento Puno, tiene 52 años D. edad, está  casada y tiene  tres  hijos.  Pudo estudiar la primaria pero no la terminó.
Leonarda se dedica al desollado D. cordero (ganado), los mismos que son entregados a los revendedores  en los mercados D. puno y algunos restaurantes D. la zona. Ella  esta trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace diez años, el primer préstamo, que fue D. S/ 300.00 nuevo soles,  le sirvió para comprar animales menores y  así poder iniciar con su negocio. 
La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio comprando otros animales menores.
Su sueño es  seguir adelante con su negocio y  tener una bodeguita.  Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y las charlas que recibe por parte D. la promotora.
texts.en:
Leonarda is a member of the community bank "Santiago Apóstol" [Saint James], located in the district of Paucarcolla in the province of Puno in the department of Puno.  She is 52 years old, married, and has three children.  She went to primary school, but she didn't finish.

Leonarda works skinning sheep, which are brought to retailers in the markets in Puno and restaurants in her area.  

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for ten years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles, which she used to buy young animals and start her business.

She is asking for a new loan of 500 nuevos soles to invest in her business by buying more animals.

Her dream is to move her business ahead and have a store.  The things she likes best about her community bank are the punctuality and the talks given by the promoter.

loans.use: Purchase animals

loans.name: Betty Encarnación

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PROGRESO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Betty; ella tiene 58 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia se dedica a la venta D. productos naturales y cosméticos, ella venD. en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como instituciones y al público en general, también realiza costura D. ropa para bebes y los venD. en la plaza Túpac Amaru que queda en una D. las calles D. la ciudad D. Cusco, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender la ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar los productos naturales al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Progeso" [Progress]. The bank is located in the district of Cusco in the province and department of Cusco. 

Betty is 58 years of age, married and has four children. The member earns a living selling natural products and cosmetics. She is an independent salesperson, traveling to various places such as institutions and to the public in general. She also sews clothes for babies and sells them in the Túpuc Amaru plaza which is on one of the streets in the city of Cusco. 

The member wants to have a clothing store. The member is seeking the loan to purchase natural products wholesale. 

The member thanks those who make up a part of this dream in this way and commits to making her payments within the established time period.

loans.use: To purchase natural products wholesale

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene dos menores hijos a su cargo, reside en el distrito de Ciudad Eten, un lugar que se ha hecho conocido por sus sombreros tejidos artesanalente a base de junco. La zona se encuentra situada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de cinco años a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en un puesto de venta situado en el mercado de su distrito, allí ella atiende a los diversos pobladores que diariamente recurren a este centro de abasto para adquirir diversos productos de uso diario. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad son utilizados para mantener a sus menores hijos.

Ella desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

Vilma es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora, tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y por ello diariamente se esfuerza al máximo para administrar su negocio de buena manera.
texts.en:
Vilma is 42 years of age, is a single mother and has two minor children in her care. She resides in the district of Ciudad Eten, a place which has gained a reputation for its traditional handknit hats made from rushes. The area is situated a half an hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

For more than five years she has labored retailing personal care items and groceries in a sales post located in her district's marketplace. There she serves the diverse inhabitants who each day flock to this centralized supply point in order to to acquire a variety of products for their daily use. The income she receives from this business is used to support her minor children. 

She wishes to expand her business with the purchase of more products in order to satisfy her customers' demand and receive a greater income. Thus she thought it wise to seek from Edpyme Alternative a loan of 1,200 nuevos soles with which she plans to achieve her goal. 

Vilma is a determined and enterprising woman with a strong desire to get ahead. She puts in maximum effort every day in order to run her business well.

loans.use: To purchase basic supplies and groceries to expand her business

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila tiene 28 años D. edad, es casada y tiene un hijo menor D. edad, resiD. junto a su esposo en el distrito D. Ciudad Eten, una zona que se ha hecho conocida por la elaboración artesanal D. sombreros tejidos a base D. junco. El lugar se encuentra situado a media hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica desD. hace mas D. cinco años a la comercialización D. pescado fresco en el interior del mercado D. su distrito. Ella adquiere su mercadería diariamente en el terminal pesquero D. la región y luego ofrece su mercadería a los vecinos D. la zona que diariamente recurren a este centro D. abasto para adquirir diversos productos D. uso diario. Los ingresos que ella percibe D. esta actividad son utilizados para ayudar a su esposo, que es obrero D. construcción civil, con el sostenimiento D. la economía familiar.

Petronila desea ampliar su negocio con la compra D. más pescado fresco D. modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda D. sus clientes. Adicionalmente desea realizar algunas mejoras en su vivienda. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta.

Petronila es una mujer con mucho carisma y que siempre brinda buen trato a sus clientes. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer bastante responsable y confiable.
texts.en:
Petronila is 28 years old. She is married and has a young child. She lives with her husband in the district of Ciudad Eten, an area which has become known for its production of handmaD. woven straw hats. The area is half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

For more than five years, Petronila has worked selling fresh fish in the market of her district. She acquires her merchandise each day at the region's fishing terminal, and later she offers her products to neighbors in her area, who come to this supply center daily to acquire a range of everyday products. The income she receives from this work is used to help her husband, who is a civil construction laborer, to proviD. the family's economic support. 

Petronila wants to expand her business by purchasing more fresh fish so she can satisfy her customers' demands. In addition, she would like to make some improvements to her home. For this reason, she has decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 Peruvian new soles, which will help her achieve her goal. 

Petronila is a woman with great charisma who always provides good service to her customers. People who know her consider her a very responsible and trustworthy woman.

loans.use: Buying fresh fish to expand her business

loans.name: Ralph Edward

texts.es:
Ralph tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a sus familiares en el distrito de La Victoria, una zona urbana que se encuentra conformada en su mayoría por zonas marginales. Durante los últimos años se ha venido desarrollando y la calidad de vida de sus habitantes ha venido mejorando.

Ralph ha arrendado una cochera que pertenece a una iglesia católica de la zona y se vale de esta para agenciarse de ingresos ofreciendo servicio de estacionamiento a los vehículos de la zona. El ya lleva cinco años trabajando en este negocio y con esta actividad solventa sus gastos personales y ayuda a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

El desea realizar algunas mejoras en la cochera e instalar algunos acabados, de modo que pueda brindar un mejor servicio, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en el logro de su objetivo.

Ralph es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien amable y confiable.
texts.en:
Ralph is 31 years old, single, and lives with his family in the district of La Victoria, an urban area made up mostly of marginalized areas.  In the last few years, it has been developing and the quality of life of its inhabitants has been improving.

Ralph has leased a garage that belongs to the neighborhood Catholic church and earns income by offering parking to vehicles in the area.  He has had this business for five years, and it covers his personal expenses and helps his family with household expenses.

He would like to make some improvements to the garage and install some finishes so that he can offer a better service, so he has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to achieve his goal.

Ralph is a quiet and responsible person.  People who know him consider him to be friendly and honest.

loans.use: Maintenance costs for the premises used to park vehicles

loans.name: Delia Rosario

texts.es:
Delia de 38 años, tiene una pequeña papelería, Vive con su esposo y su hija en una zona  caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes llamada suburbio de Guayaquil.  

Escogió tener una papelería porque le gusta la actividad de atender a clientes y obtener un beneficio. Poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo comprar diversa papelería e incremento su papelería. En la actualidad tiene trabaja de lunes a domingo vendiendo cuadernos a $ 1.00, plumas, lápices, papelería, perfumes, juguetes etc. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cuadernos, plumas, papelería y ropa para su papelería. En el futuro quiere seguir con su negocio y comprar un camión para distribuir la papelería.
texts.en:
38-year-old Delia has a small stationary store. She lives with her husband and her daughter in an area called suburb of Guayaquil that is characterized by the fact that the majority of the inhabitants are merchants.

She chose to have a paper store because she likes attending to customers and making a profit. Little by little, with effort, she was able to buy diverse stationary and increase the size of her business. Currently, she works from Monday to Sunday selling notebooks for $1.00, pens, pencils, stationary, perfume, toys etc.

With the loan, she wants to buy notebooks, pens, stationary and clothing for her paper store. In the future, she wants to continue this business and to buy a truck to distribute the stationary.

loans.use: To buy accesories and stationary

loans.name: Ursula

texts.es:
Ursula tiene 57 años D. edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo en el distrito D. Ciudad Eten, una zona que se ha hecho conocida por la elaboración artesanal D. sombreros tejidos a base D. junco. El lugar se encuentra situado a media hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

DesD. hace 18 años tiene instalado en el mercado D. abastos D. la ciudad D. Monsefú un puesto D. venta D. verduras. Todos los días ofrece a sus clientes una variedad D. legumbres y tubérculos frescos los cuales adquiere en el mercado mayorista D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo. Este negocio es una fuente importante D. ayuda a la familia, ya que lo que su esposo gana como albañil no es suficiente para solventar los gastos familiares. El negocio D. Ursula siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad. 

Ella desea adquirir más mercadería, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1800 nuevos soles. Ursula ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el fondo Kiva, gracias a este préstamo pudo ampliar su negocio y mejorar su calidad D. vida con las ganancias que obtuvo. Por ello se encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que colaboraron con ella a través D. Kiva.

Ursula es una mujer bastante trabajadora y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria.
texts.en:
Ursula is 57 years old. She is married and lives together with her husband in the district of Ciudad Eten, an area which has become known for its production of handmaD. straw hats. The area is located half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

For the past 18 years, she has operated a sales stand selling vegetables in the supply market of the city of Monsefú. Every day, she offers her customers a variety of leafy and root vegetables, which she buys at the wholesale market in the city of Chiclayo. This business is an important source of help for her family, since what her husband earns as a mason is not sufficient to cover the family's expenses. Ursula's business always has customers who prefer her for her friendliness and good service. 

She would like to acquire more merchandise, and for this reason she has decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1800 Peruvian new soles. Ursula has already had a loan financed by the Kiva fund; thanks to this loan she was able to expand her business and improve her quality of life with the profits she obtained. Because of this, she is very grateful to all of the people who have supported her through Kiva. 

Ursula is a woman who is very hard-working and very devoted to her family. Her greatest desire is to keep growing as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: Buying merchandise to expand her business

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras”  ubicado en el distrito Cabanilla,  provincia de Lampa y departamento de Puno, tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil  soltera y no  tiene hijos,  la señora  estudio educación superior completo.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 04 años,  su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de ganados.  Paralelamente se dedica al tejido.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá comprando lanas para tejer sus chompas, colchas y tapetes para luego venderlas.

Su sueño para el futuro  es ser mayoristas en  abarrotes y tener una empresa de artesanía.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es lo que gana sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Juliana is a member of the Communal Bank "Mujeres Triunfadoras" [Triumphant Women] located in the district of Cabanilla, province of Lampa and department of Puno. She is 48 years of age, single and has no children. She finished her studies through high school. 

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for four years. Her initial loan was for 300 nuevos soles which she used to increase her working capital in her cattle business. At the same time she is a dedicated knitter. 

The member will seek a new loan in the amount of 1,500 nuevos soles which she will invest in the purchase of wool for knitting her sweaters, blankets and decorative table clothes for their eventual sale. 

What she likes most about her Communal Bank is the interest earned on her savings.

loans.use: To purchase wool of various colors wholesale

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
Eulogia tiene 64 años de edad, reside junto a su familia a la altura del Km. 8 de la carretera a Jaén, la zona pertenece al distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola conformada principalmente por zonas rurales, pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra ubicada aproximadamente a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas desde hace cuatro años, ella cuenta con un pequeño terreno situado cerca a la zona donde vive. Allí ha instalado el cultivo de limón y se vale de los ingresos de esta actividad para ayudar a la economía de su familia. La fruta que cosecha la ofrece en venta a los acopiadores de la zona.

Eulogia desea adquirir fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Eulogia es una mujer luchadora y que gusta mucho de sentirse activa, las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer tranquila y de confianza.
texts.en:
Eulogia is 64 years of age and lives along with her family at kilometer 8 on the highway to Jaén. The area belongs to the district of Olmos, an agricultural region made up primarily of rural areas, belonging to the province of Lambayeque and which is located approximately two hours from the city of Chiclayo. 

She has worked in agriculture for four years and has a small plot of land situated near the area where she lives. There she has set up a lemon orchard and makes use of the earnings from this business to help meet her family's financial needs. The fruit she harvests she sells to others in the area who will then transport it to market for sale. 

Eulogia wishes to purchase fertilizers for the maintenance of her crop. Thus she thought it wise to seek a loan from Edpyme Alternative in the amount of 1,000 nuevos soles which will help her achieve her goal. 

Eulogia is a determined woman who enjoys keeping busy. The people who know her consider her to be levelheaded and worthy of trust.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers for the maintenance of her lemon crop

loans.name: Socorro Del Pilar

texts.es:
Socorro tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo ya independizado, vive junto a su madre y hermanas en el caserío Tejedores del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más de de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, ella confecciona estas prendas junto con sus hermanas en un taller ubicado en su vivienda, las prendas que confeccionan los vende en los caserío aledaños y en el puerto de Paita (donde trabaja su hijo). El negocio le ayuda para solventar sus gastos y apoyar a la economía de su familia.

Socorro desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas materiales para seguir confeccionando prendas de vestir y aumentar sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en el logro de su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante tranquila y responsable, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder mejorar gradualmente su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Socorro is 44-years-old.  She is a single mother and has a son who is now independent.
