Forty-two-year-old Twaha K. belongs to the Kagabi Multipurpose Group - Mpigi. He has been running his timber business for eight years in the Kasubi Market. It is a business that this married father of five says brings in weekly proceeds to the tune of 100,000 shillings. 

Twaha also gets additional earnings from a poultry business. He was at first into tree cutting. Twaha describes himself as meticulous and visionary. With this loan, he says he is going to revamp his business with purchases of enough timber to resell.

loans.use: The purchase of more timber for resale

loans.name: Nambale Mixed Group - Mityana

texts.en:
Forty-year-old Mesearch M.'s membership is with Nambale Mixed Group - Mityana. It’s been over eight years since this married man began his produce-selling enterprise in Nambaale. He primarily has been selling beans and maize in bulk. He took a page from the brothers who were also involved in this genre of trade. It is a worthwhile business enterprise that brings in 160,000 shillings weekly and 640,000 shillings monthly.  

The greater part of his client base comprises mostly wholesalers in and around Mityana. He says with this loan, he is going to purchase more bags of beans and maize for reselling.

loans.use: The purchase of more bags of beans and maize for resale

loans.name: Namutamala Women's Group - Mpigi

texts.en:
Thirt-four-year-old Vincent K., who radiates gentleness, humility and steadfastness, has had a metal-shop business at his home in Mpigi for seven years. Self-motivation was the underlying factor behind the start-up of this enterprise. Prior to that, Vincent, who is married with four children, says he was more partial to farming. He still has a hand in his farming business but he says it is now more of a second fiddle means of subsistence. 

He is also taking a long view as he says he wants to expand his business even further. Monthly, this metal-shop business generates profits to the tune of 200,000 shillings. With this loan, Vincent, who is affiliated with the Namutamala Women's Group - Mpigi, says he is going to purchase more metal products for reselling.

loans.use: The purchase of more metal products for resale

loans.name: Mukwano Kwagalana Development - Kampala Group

texts.en:
Lawrance K., 54, has been running a brick-selling business in Kito-Kampala for a decade now. It is a business he says he began with his own initiative after rearing and selling livestock.  

Lawrence says he is married with 13 kids, three of whom are in school. He says this business venture generates 280,000 shillings monthly. With this loan, he says he is going to buy firewood for burning his bricks. 

K. belongs to the Mukwano Kwagalana Group - Kampala.

loans.use: The purchase of firewood for burning his bricks

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro trabaja en la Policía Nacional de Bolivia; la esposa es artesana y confecciona mantas para las señoras de pollera. Tienen su casa propia y sus dos hijos de 3 y 12 años que dependen de la pareja. Viven en la zona Tahauantinsuyo de la ciudad de El Alto.
El crédito que solicita será utilizado para pagar el costo de refacción de su vivienda para tener una mayor comodidad.

Es el primer crédito con IMPRO y  vía Kiva.
texts.en: Pedro works for the National Police of Bolivia. His wife is an artisan who makes shawls for the Cholitas, or women who wear traditional pollera skirts. They have their own house and two sons, aged 3 and 12 years old, who depend on their parents. They live in the Tahauantinsuyo area of the city of El Alto. The loan will be used to pay the cost of repairing their house and making it more comfortable. This is the first loan from IMPRO and from Kiva.

loans.use: To repair his house in order to make it more comfortable

loans.name: Jarol

texts.es:
Jarol es comerciante y supervisor de productos nutritivos de Herba Life; vive en la casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona San Roque de la ciudad de El Alto. 
El crédito que ahora solicita es para la compra de más mercadería (productos Herba Life) para cubrir la demanda de sus clientes y tener reservas listas para nuevos lcientes.

Es el primer crédito con IMPRO y también el primero via Kiva.
texts.en:
Jarol is a merchant and a supervisor of Herba Life nutritional products. He lives at his parents' home, which is located in the San Roque area of the city of El Alto.The loan he is asking for is to buy more Herba Life products to cover the current demand of his clients and to have reserves to sell to new clients. 
It is the first loan he is requesting from IMPRO and from Kiva as well.

loans.use: To buy more Herba Life merchandise to sell to his clients

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La señora Esperanza dedicada a la venta de comida, desde muy temprano ella se levanta para cocinar sus deliciosos platos que son vendidos a medio día, ya conocida en el lugar ella tiene un propósito que es la de ampliar su negocio y así llegar a todos los clientes de Cochabamba y ser reconocida en el ámbito de la comida, cocina muy bien y tiene mucha clientela, es muy amable con sus clientes y muy carismática, desde muy niña trabajo ayudando a su mama,  este crédito ayudara a la señora a comprar un refrigerador y así poder mantener sus verduras frescas para la elaboración de su platillos, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Esperanza sells food for a living. She gets up very early to cook her delicious dishes and sells them at midday. She is known in the area. Her goal is to expand her business and reach all the customers in Cochabamba and become more well-known in the field of food. She cooks very well, has a lot of customers, and is very friendly with them as well as very charismatic.  Since she was a child she worked helping her mother. This loan would help Esperanza to buy a refrigerator and keep the vegetables she uses in her dishes fresh. She is very grateful to Emprender for the support they have given her.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer muy trabajadora, dedicada a apoyar  a su familia, uno de sus anhelos ha sido la mejora de su casa.
 Trabaja como conserje desde hace varios años, y ha logrado poner una pequeña pulpería en su casa. Con los financiamiento que la institución ha dado lo ha invertido parte en el comercio y en su vivienda.
Con el crédito anterior su objetivo era cambiar todo el techo, no lo logra ya que solo compro una parte de materiales ya que todo está ah altos costos. Con este nuevo préstamo llevara a cabo su proyecto de poder cambiar todo su techo que será de mucho ya que por los años está ya muy viejo. Siendo Afodenic una puerta al cambio. 
Comprara mas laminas de zinc, perlines, golosos, soldadura para hacer el cambio.
texts.en:
Gloria is a very hardworking woman who is dedicated to helping her family. One of her greatest wishes has been to improve her home.

She has worked as a custodian for many years and has been able to install a small grocery store in her house. She has invested part of the loans that she has been granted by Afodenic in her business and the other part in her house. 

With her previous loan Gloria wanted to completely replace the roof of her house, however she wasn’t able to do so because she could only purchase some of the materials as they were quite expensive. With this new loan she will complete this project and replace the whole roof because it is many years old now and is quite worn. Afodenic has been the agent for this change.

Gloria will purchase more zinc sheeting, purlins, welding agents, and other construction materials to replace her roof and improve her home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to replace her roof and improve her home

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es:
Carlos es padre de familia de tres hijos, es un hombre que junto a su esposa trabajan para poder dar lo necesario a su familia.
El trabajo de don Carlos es el servicio de taxi, el cual lo hace día a día recorriendo la capital. Anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio, pero luego le dan el trabajo como cadete. Su esposa labora en un almacén y ambos han logrado mejorar su casa con apoyo de Afodenic quien ha dado financiamientos para hacer las mejoras
Con su crédito anterior logro comprar su inodoro e instalarlo, ahora con este nuevo préstamo comenzara la construcción de un cuarto. En donde comprara: decientas piedras, hierro siete bolsas de cemento, arena entre otros y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Carlos is a family man with three children, and he works together with his wife in order to grant bare necessities to their family.
Carlos’ job is to provide taxi services, which he does every day driving around the capital. He previously worked in a shop, but then he has been offered a job as taxi driver. His wife works in a store and, thanks to AFODENIC’s support in granting the funds to make the improvements, they both have succeeded in ameliorating their house.
With his previous loan he was able to buy and install his toilet; whit this new loan he will now begin to build a room. Among other things he will buy two hundred stones, iron, seven sacks of cement and sand in order to start the works.

loans.use: To buy stones, sand, cement and iron to build a room

loans.name: Arlen Del Carmen

texts.es:
Arlen es una joven de 27 años, soltera y vive junto con sus padres, son de pocos recursos económicos.
Hoy en día trabaja como secretaria, en una empresa privada,  tiene tres años laborando iniciando en un proyecto europeo. El cual a través de su trabajo ha logrado pagarse sus estudios el cual está en quinto año de derecho en donde con muchos esfuerzos y dedicación lo ha logrado.
Atreves del financiamiento podrá construir  un muro en la parte frontal en donde ya tiene un comienzo pero por falta de efectivo no ha logrado terminarlo ya que ha tenido muchos gastos en la universidad. Es por tal razón que nace la iniciativa de un préstamo en donde le permita pagarlo a plazo y así poder terminar el muro. Comprara piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y lograr su objetivo que gracias Afodenic se hará posible
texts.en:
Arlen is a young woman of 27, she is single and lives with her parents, and they have limited economic resources.
She is currently working as a secretary for a private company, she has been working there for three years, and she started thanks to a European project. Thanks to her job she has succeeded in paying for her university education: she now attends the fifth year of Law, which she has managed to do with many efforts and great dedication.
The loan will be used to have a protective wall in front of her house, a job that had already been started, but that hasn’t been finished because of lack of money since she has had to pay for a lot of university expenses. It is for this reason that the idea of asking for a loan came to her, so that she will be able to pay for it in installments and therefore have the wall finished. She will buy stone, sand, cement and iron to reach her goal, and she hopes that thanks to AFODENIC this will be possible.

loans.use: To buy construiction supplies in order to keep on building a protective wall in front of her house.

loans.name: Adalberto

texts.es:
Adalberto trabaja como empleado operario de una máquina en una empresa donde elaboran té y chocolate, con cuyos ingresos  cubre la manutención de su familia. Está casado y tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. Vive en la zona Huayna Potosí de la ciudad de El Alto.
El crédito que solicita es para la refacción de la cocina de la casa donde vive para tener una mejor comodidad y mejores condiciones de salubridad al preparar sus alimentos.

Es el segundo crédito con IMPRO y  vía Kiva.
texts.en:
Adalberto works as a machine operator for a business where they make tea and chocolate. His earnings are used to take care of his family. He is married and has a three year old son. He lives in the Huayna Potosi area of the city of El Alto.

This loan he is requesting is to repair the kitchen of his home in order to be make it more comfortable and to have more healthy conditions in which to prepare food. 

This is his second loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: To repair the kitchen of his home in order to have better health and hygiene.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo  solicito 700 $us, se dedica a la compra de cuero en bruto y su posterior curtido y comercialización, vive junto a su hermana  y su madre, en la zona villa Tunari de la ciudad de El Alto.
 Con el crédito comprara materia prima  al por mayor. Este es  el segundo crédito en impro y el primero vía Kiva.
texts.en:
Alfredo is requesting 700 US dollars. His business is buying raw leather and then tanning it and selling it. He lives with his sister and mother in the Villa Tunari area in the city of El Alto.
With the loan he will buy the raw materials wholesale. This is his second loan with IMPRO, and his first with Kiva.

loans.use: To buy raw leather in order to tan it and then sell it to companies that make leather clothing.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan es padre de familia de  cuatro hijos, muy dedicado al trabajo para lograr dar lo necesario a su familia.
Trabaja en servicio de seguridad, desde hace varios años, ha sido su trabajo, teniendo el apoyo de su esposa ya que trabaja como enfermera.
 Es atreves de los financiamiento en Afodenic que ha logrado hacer las mejora a su pequeña casa. Con el crédito logro reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que por ser viejo se le pasaba el agua.
Con este nuevo préstamo lograra levantar las paredes de concreto ya que es minifalda de concreto y madera y quiere seguir con el mejoramiento para una mejor vivienda  a su familia. Comprara bloques, arena, cemento, hierro para comenzar la construcción.
texts.en:
Juan is a father with four children and is very dedicated to working hard to provide for his family.

He has worked for several years in the security business. His wife is a nurse and also helps support their family.

Through the loan from Afodenic he has been able to make improvements on their small house. With a previous loan he was able to repair the roof of the house which was old and leaking. 

He will use this loan to raise concrete walls for his house because his walls are currently part concrete and part wood. He wants to continue making improvements to provide a better house for his family. He will buy concrete blocks, sand, cement, and iron to start construction.

loans.use: Purchase of blocks, sand, cement, and iron to raise the concrete walls of his house.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
Bruno  solicito 1000 $us,  trabaja como chofer asalariado en transporte urbano en la ciudad de El Alto;  es soltero y vive en la zona Estrellas de la ciudad de El Alto.

El crédito lo empleara en la construcción de un muro perimetral en un terreno que es de su propiedad. Es   el primer  crédito en impro y el primero vía Kiva.
texts.en:
Bruno requested $1000 USD.  He works as a driver employed in urban transport in the city of El Alto.  He is single and lives in the neighborhood Estrellas in El Alto.

He will use the loan to construct a perimeter wall on land that he owns.  This is his first loan with IMPRO as well as with Kiva.

loans.use: To build a wall on land that he owns.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corrugated metal roofing, purlins, bolts, cement and sand for a room’s roof to improve living conditions

loans.name: Carla

texts.es:
La señorita Carla es soltera, no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus tíos los cuales viven en anticretico, en la zona de Villa Nuevo Potosí de la ciudad de La Paz.
Carla trabaja realizando todo tipo de hilado de mantas, y también realiza edición de grabaciones para la universidad. Es así como obtiene sus ingresos para su hogar.
El crédito solicitado es para la compra de una computadora  y así realizar mejor su trabajo y  poder aumentar sus ingresos.
Es su primer crédito y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Carla is single and doesn't have any children.  She lives in her aunt and uncle's house.  They live in 'anticretico' (a special rental system offered in Bolivia) in Villa Nueva Potosí district, in the city of La Paz.

Carla works knitting blankets and also does video editing for the university.  This is how she makes income for her household.

The loan which she is requesting is for buying a computer so that she can carry out her work better and increase her income.

This is her first loan and the socio-economic analysis we have performed qualifies her favorably to receive a loan.

loans.use: To buy a computer which will allow her to create her hand-made crafts in better conditions

loans.name: Mireya Luisa

texts.es:
Mireya es una pequeña comerciante que ah crecido gracias a su tenacidad y empeño a su trabajo en la venta de ropa nueva y usada y una variedad de cosméticos en donde ha captado clientela por sus muchos años en el negocio.
Iniciando con poco capital propio, que su esposo dio, de su trabajo como electricista,  y apoyo de la institución con sus créditos siendo este el decimo en donde invertirá en la compra de mercadería. Como ropa para dama, blusas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, ropa para bebe, toallas, sandalias, cosmético. Entre otros que vende.
Contenta porque cada día mejora su inversión, también está ganando un dinero extra trabajando como tutora de programa social. Lo que significa que podrá pronto hacer mejoras a su casa.
texts.en: Mireya has a small business and, thanks to her tenacity and hard work, has grown her business selling new and used clothing and a variety of cosmetics.  She has been popular with her customers for many years.  She began her business with a bit of money her husband gave her from his job as an electrician, as well as with the support of this institution.  This is her tenth loan that she will invest in purchasing merchandise, such as women's clothing, blouses, skirts, pants, underwear, baby clothing, towels, sandals, and cosmetics, as well as others.  Happy because each day she earns back part of what she has invested, she is also earning extra money working as a tutor at a social program.  This means she will soon be able to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: To buy assorted clothing: skirts, shirts, underwear, baby clothing, makeup, and sandals

loans.name: Cesar Antonio

texts.es:
Cesar es un hombre muy dedicado  al negocio,  logrando así tener su propio ingreso para dar lo necesaR.  a su familia.
La venta de fritanga, refrescos todos los días en su casa de habitación con el apoyo de su esposa. Inicio hace cinco años sus ventas lo que ha venido trabajando con dinero propio y dinero que la institución ha dado para hacer mas comida y tener variedad de alimentos.
Con este nuevo crédito es aumentar la compra de carne de res, cerdo, pollo, verduras, frutas, gaseosas, bidón de aceite, logrando así equilibrar las ventas con variedad de menú.
Para él es de gran satisfacción el poder seguir invirtiendo en su negocio ya que es su fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Cesar is a very dedicated business man. This way, he can have his own business in order give his family their basic needs.
He sells fried snacks and soft drinks every day at his house with the help of his wife. He started his business five years ago with some of his own money and with money the institution gave him to make more food and to have a greater variety of products.
This new loan will be used to increase the purchases of beef, pork, chicken, vegetables, fruit, soft drinks and cans of oil. This will help to balance the sales with variety of the menu.
For Cesar, it’s a great pleasure to be able to continue investing in his business since it is his source of income.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork, chicken, vegetables, fruit and cans of oil in order to maintain a variety of delicious dishes for his daily sales.

loans.name: Edwin Rene

texts.es:
Edwin, se dedica a la venta de comida, tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 19, 16, 5 años de edad, el mayor de los hijos estudia en la universidad y trabaja al mismo tiempo, el segundo también estudia bachillerato, y la chiquitina esta en Kínder, el negocio funciona bajo la dinámica de ofrecer almuerzos a domicilio a los empleados que laboran en un edificio contiguo a su casa, donde los empleados piden que la comida les sea llevada hasta su oficina.
Ahora él está solicitando un préstamo porque quiere compra mercadería de cocina (pollo, carne, quesillo) y  equipo para instalar una pupuseria atendiéndola en horas nocturnas de 6:00 a 9:00 pm,  este préstamo ayudara a diversificar sus productos a la venta ya que hasta el momento su fuerte han  sido los almuerzos, las pupusas presentan mucha demanda es por eso la iniciativa de ofrecer una nueva actividad.
Su sueño es establecer un negocio con bases solidas, poder ver a sus hijos realizados y generar cada día mejores ingresos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Edwin sells food, is 35 years old, and lives with his wife and three children, ages 19, 16, and 5.  The eldest of his children attends college and works at the same time, the second child is in high school, and the little one is in kindergarten.  The business operates under the dynamics of providing lunches to employees who work in a building adjacent to his house, where the employees ask for food to be delivered to their office.

Edwin is applying for a loan now because he wants to buy food materials (chicken, beef, cheese) and equipment to intall a pupuseria (restaurant that serves pupusas, meat filled corn tortillas), operating in the evening hours of 6:00 pm to 9:00 pm.  This loan will help to diversify the products that he sells.  So far his strength has been the lunches, but the pupusas are in high demand so that is his initiative of offering a new activity.

His dream is to establish a business with a solid foundation to be able to wtiness his children's achievements and generate more income for the household.

loans.use: To buy chicken, beef, and cheese.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
La señora Aurelia es agricultora, vive en la zona D. Mallco Rancho localidad ubicada en las afueras D. la ciudad D. Cochabamba a 21 Km  D. la ciudad. Se encuentra casada, su esposo es maestro, que trabaja tambien en la escuela D. la zona, La señora Aurelia tambien cuenta con una pequeña peluqueria actividad que le ayuda a generar ingresos.

La actividad D. agricultura que tiene la señora Aurelia se ha visto afectada por la escasez D. lluvia razon por la que necesita comprar accionpara la perforacion D. un pozo D. agua para riego, ese es el motivo por que solicita el credito.

Al contar con mas agua para su terreno agricola ella podra producir mejor su maiz, cebolla.
texts.en:
Aurelia is a farmer and lives in the Mallco Rancho zone located on the outskirts of Cochabamba city, about 21km from the city. She is married and her husband is a teacher who works in the school in the zone. Aurelia has a small hair-dressing salon which also helps her to generate earnings.

Aurelia's farming business has been affected by the shortage of rain in the zone, for which Aurelia needs to buy labour to drill a water hole for irrigation. This is the motive for which she is seeking a loan. 

When Aurelia has more water for her agricultural land she will be able to better produce her maize and onions.

loans.use: Purchase labour to drill a water hole for irrigation

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, su negocio es la compra y venta de chatarras y un taller de enderezado de pintura, él vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 11 y 8 años de edad; la compra y venta de chatarra la está haciendo desde hace 1 año y el taller lo tiene desde hace 5 años, está en proceso de la instalación de la energía eléctrica y compra de algunas herramientas para el taller,  motivo que lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo y de solventar la necesidad de la energía y de mejorar el taller.
Su proyección es administrar bien este préstamo realizar la inversión prevista, seguir trabajando de la mejor manera para contar con estos ingresos que le ayudan a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan resides in the Jiquilisco department in Usulután. His business is the buying and selling of scrap metal and an auto body shop (repairs and painting). He lives with his wife and 2 children, 11 and 8. He has been purchasing scrap metal for 1 year and has had the workshop for 5 years. Juan is in the process of installing electricity and purchasing some tools for his workshop, the reason for which he is seeking a loan to cover the costs of electricity and improve his workshop. 

Hi plan is to administer the loan well, making the anticipated investment, and to continue working in the best way possible with these earnings that help him and his family.

loans.use: Purchase tools for his workshop and install electricity

loans.name: Edwin Ernesto

texts.es:
Edwin, quien es de Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, tiene 32 años de edad, es empleado,  el es casado y vive con su esposa y una hija, lleva ya 6 años de trabajar en un taller de General de Cajas; por el momento enfrenta problemas con el vehículo y necesita llevarlo al mecánico, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la reparación del vehículo y dejarlo en buenas condiciones, este préstamo ayudara a que Edwin, solventes sus problemas y pueda viajar seguro en su automóvil.
Su objetivo es reparar su vehículo, tenerlo en condiciones adecuadas para viajar con su familia, también cuidar de su empleo y velar por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin, who is from Santa Elena in the Department of Usulután, is 32 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and their daughter, and has been working for 6 years in a workshop. 

At the moment he is facing problems with his car and he needs to take it to a mechanic. This is why he is asking for a loan to pay for car repairs and get his vehicle into good running condition. This loan will help Edwin resolve his car problems and travel safely.

Edwin's goal is to repair the vehicle and have it in good condition so that he can travel with his family, keep his job and look out for his family's well-being.

loans.use: Vehicle repair

loans.name: Maria Ermelinda

texts.es:
María, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, tiene 42 años D. edad, su negocio es la venta D. sopa D. mondongo (pansa D. vaca), chilate y tamales, ella vive con su esposo don Cristino R. y sus dos hijos José Cristino D. 17 años D. edad, Johana Melissa D. 13 años D. edad, ella realiza sus ventas tres veces por semana alternando sus ventas D. sopa, otros días tamales y otros chilate con miel, como estrategia para que sus clientes le compren seguido.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo  para la compra D. los ingredientes como verduras para la sopa, maíz y plátano para el chilate y los tamales, su intención es tener a disponibilidad lo necesario para la preparación D. su venta y D. esta manera estar preparada para la demanda.
Ella sueña con tener la capacidad económica para apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios y que estos se preparen para optar por mejor estilo D. vida.
texts.en:
María lives in San Francisco Gotera.  She is 42 years old and has a business selling the following food items: "sopa D. mondongo" (cow tripe soup), chilate (a traditional corn-based warm drink) and tamales.  She lives with her husband, don Cristino R., and their two children, 17 year-old José Cristino and 13 year-old Johana Melissa.  Maria makes her sales three times a week.  As a business strategy to encourage her customers  to make frequent purchases, she alternates between offering soups some days, chilate with honey other days and tamales on still other days.
Currently, Maria is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients, like vegetables for the soup and corn and bananas for the chilate and the tamales.  Her plan is to have enough ingredients available that she can prepare enough food for sale to meet the demand.
She hopes to have the financial capacity to support her children in their education so that they can be able to choose a better way of life.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables, corn and bananas.

loans.name: Virgina

texts.es:
Virginia es costurera, confecciona chamarras y también tiene una movilidad que trabaja de trasporte publico de pasajeros en la ruta La Paz – El Alto; tiene un hijo de dos años de edad; vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito que solicita es para cubrir el costo de conversión de Gasolina a Gas Natural vehicular, pues esto le generará un ahorro de hasta un 60 % en combustible.
 
 Es el segundo crédito con IMPRO y el primer vía Kiva.
texts.en:
Virginia is a seamstress and she manufactures jackets.  She also has a vehicle and works in public transport of passengers on routes from La Paz-El Alto.  She has a two-year-old son and lives at home with her parents in the neighborhood of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz.

She is asking for a loan to cover the cost of converting from gas to a natural gas vehicle, as this will generate a savings of up to 60% on fuel.

This is her second loan with IMPRO and her first via Kiva.

loans.use: For the cost of converting from gas to a natural gas vehicle that she uses to transport passengers.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
Fredy vive en casa propia cuyo domicilio esta ubicado en la comunidad Chahuira pampa. El es productor lechero y su esposa le colabora en todas las actividades agrícolas. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención. El tiene Dos hijos. 
 
El préstamo lo destinara para la compra de una vaca lechera. Esto le permitirá aumentar su producción de leche.
 
Es primer crédito con Impro.
texts.en:
Fredy lives in his own house, located in the community of Chahuira Pampa. He is a dairy farmer and his wife helps him with the farming work. This is their main source of income to support themselves. He has two children.
 
He will use the loan to buy a dairy cow, which will allow him to increase his milk production.

This is his first loan wiht Impro.

loans.use: Buy a dairy cow to increase milk production.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.es:
Pamela vive en casa de sus padres cuyo domicilio esta ubicado en la ciudad de el alto zona urbanización Mercurio de la ciudad de El Alto. Ella realiza productos de repostería, especialmente masitas empanadas y queques. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención. Ella no tiene hijos, vive con sus padres. 
 
El préstamo lo destinara para la compra de Harina y azúcar. Esto le permitirá aumentar su capital y su producción.
 
Es primer crédito con Impro.
texts.en:
Pamela lives with her parents in the urban area of Mercurio in the city of El Alto. She makes pastries, especially pies, pasties and cakes. This is her main source of income to support herself. She has no children and lives with her parents. 

She will use the loan to buy flour and sugar, which will allow her to increase her working capital. 

This is her first loan with Impro.

loans.use: Buy flour and sugar to continue with her pastry business.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
José Raúl, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, tiene un taller de mecánica de automotores, vive con su esposa y su único hijo de nombre Cesar, José tiene 35 años de edad, su negocio es el taller y se dedica a él desde hace 10 años; por el momento quiere arreglar una herramienta que le sirve para soldar y también una motocicleta para hacerlo solicita un préstamo por una cantidad que le ajuste a pagar los repuestos y la mano de obra. Con esta ayuda el solventara esta situación y podrá tener en perfectas condiciones la herramienta y su motocicleta.
Su objetivo es mejorar la calidad de servicio a los automotores, y de esta manera ganarse la confianza de ellos para contar con los trabajos que necesiten, así estará asegurando ingresos para su hogar para que mejoren sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José Raúl lives in Jiquilisco, in Usulután department.  He owns a mechanic shop.  He lives with his wife and his only son Cesar.  José is 35 years old.  His business is his mechanic shop and he has been working there for 10 years.  Right now he would like to fix a piece of equipment which he uses for welding and also a motorcycle.  In order to do this he needs to take a loan for a quantity that will allow him to pay for the spare parts and labor.  This loan will help him resolve his situation and he will be able to have his piece of equipment and motorcycle in perfect condition.

José Raúl's goal is to improve the quality of service which he provides to drivers and thereby gain their trust.  In this way he will guarantee his household income so that he can improve his living conditions.

loans.use: To repair a piece of equipment and a motorcycle

loans.name: Karina Esmeralda

texts.es:
Karina, posee una tienda llamada Kevin, está casada y tiene un hijo D. 14 años, residen en Jiquilisco, departamento D. Usulután, ella comenzó con el negocio muy pequeño, eran pocas las cosas que ofrecía pero hoy han pasado 8 años y este negocio esta mucho mas fuerte con bastante mercadería para atender a los clientes,  pero ella quiere seguir progresando es por eso que solicita un préstamo para la compra D. una refrigeradora, ya que la que tiene ya le queda pequeña para guardar la mercadería que necesita refrigeración.
Este préstamo le ayudara a almacenar más cosas como bebidas ya que últimamente ha tenido mucha demanda. Ella sueña con generar mas ventas con los clientes, para ir fortaleciendo económicamente el hogar y puedan vivir mas cómodamente.
texts.en:
Karina owns a store called Kevin.  She is married and has a 14 year old son.  They live in Jiquilisco in the department of Usulután.  

She started out small with her store, and only offered a few things, but eight years later, the store is much stronger and has enough merchandise to satisfy her customers.  She would like to continue improving her store, so she is asking for a loan to buy a refrigerator.  The one she has now is too small to store all of the merchandise that needs to be refrigerated.  This loan will help her stock more things like drinks, that are in high demand.  

She wants to generate more sales to strengthen herself economically and be able to live more comfortably.

loans.use: Purchase a refrigerator

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maritza, resiD. en Jiquilisco departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la venta D. productos plásticos, es casada y vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 14 y 24 años D. edad, este negocio tiene ya 6 años D. existir ella ofrece a los clientes, artículos plásticos, gorras, carteras y su esposo le ayuda a brindar un buen servicio y atención a los clientes.
Hoy ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería ya que los clientes le están solicitando artículos que ella no tiene y para no perderlos piensa comprar lo que le solicitan, su objetivo es brindarles lo necesario aumentando el inventario para tener disponibilidad.
 Ella sueña con mejorar el negocio, satisfacer  a los clientes, y generar más ganancias para el hogar y apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Maritza lives in Jiquilisco, in Usulután department.  She works selling plastic products.  Maritza is married and lives with her two children aged 14 and 24.  She has had her business for 6 years.  She offers her customers plastic articles, caps and purses.  Her husband helps her to proviD. her customers with good service.

Maritza is requesting a loan to buy merchandise since her customers are asking her for articles which she doesn't have.  In order not to lose her customers she would like to buy what they are requesting.  Her goal is to proviD. them with what they need, increasing her inventory so as to have more goods available.

Martiza dreams of improving her business, satisfying her customers, making more profits for her household and supporting her children in their studies.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (plastic articles)

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 39 años de edad, es separada y cuenta con tres hijos a su cargo, reside en el caserío La Clake, una zona rural del distrito de Reque, conformado por pobladores muy humildes que usualmente se dedican  a la agricultura y a la ganadería, cuenta con electricidad, sin embargo se valen de un pozo para agenciarse de agua. La zona se encuentra situada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura, especialmente a la ganadería, ella cuenta con dos vacas, de las cuales comercializa la leche que producen diariamente entre sus vecinos y en el mercado del distrito. Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso por lo que siempre trata de mantener su negocio de la mejor forma, brindando una buena alimentación y cuidados a sus vacas.

Santos desea ampliar su negocio incursionando en la crianza y comercialización de animales menores, por ello ha decidido solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo.

Santos es una mujer bastante responsable y que tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Santos is 39 years old, separated, and has three children.  She lives in the village of La Clake, a rural area in the Reque district, which is made up of humble people who usually work in agriculture and livestock.  It has electricity, but still relies on a well for their water supply.  It is located a half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She works in agriculture, especially with livestock.  She has two cows, and she sells the milk they produce to her neighbors and at the market in her district.  This is her primary source of income, so she tries to maintain her business at a high level by giving her cows good food and care.

Santos would like to expand her business into raising and selling small animals, so she decided to ask for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edypme Alternativa to achieve her goal.

Santos is a responsible woman who has a drive to get ahead.  People that know her think highly of her and respect her.

loans.use: Purchase animals and balanced feed

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio tiene 65 años de edad, es casado y vive junto a su esposa y a dos de sus siete hijos en el caserío Puerto Arturo del distrito de Reque, una zona rural de pobladores bastante humildes que se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

Se dedica a la elaboración de ladrillos y adobes (dos piezas hechas a base de barro y arcilla que son utilizadas en labores de albañilería, los adobes son los más baratos) el produce estos materiales en un descampado que queda cercano a su vivienda. 

Gregorio desea adquirir mas insumos para ampliar su nivel de ventas y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta.

El es un padre bastante trabajador y que siempre ha dado lo mejor de si para sacar a su familia adelante, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien responsable y confiable.
texts.en:
Gregorio is 65 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and two of his seven children in the village of Puerto Arturo in the district of Reque, a rural area with humble inhabitants who work primarily in agriculture and ranching. 

He works making bricks and adobes (two pieces made from a base of mud and clay which are used in bricklaying, the adobes are the cheaper ones). He produces these materials in an open air area near his house. 

Gregorio wants to acquire more supplies to increase his level of sales and receive a greater income. For this he has found it advisable to ask Edpyme Alternative for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to help him accomplish his goal. 

He is a hardworking father and he has always given the best of himself to move his family forward. The people who know him consider him to be responsible and reliable.

loans.use: To buy supplies to increase his brick and adobe making business.

loans.name: José De Los Santos

texts.es:
José de los Santos tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el caserío Caracucho del distrito de Mórrope, una zona rural habitada por personas humildes que suelen dedicarse a la agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la apicultura, el posee algunas colmenas en un terreno aledaño al lugar en donde reside, el extrae durante varias temporadas la miel que producen las abejas y la comercializa mensualmente, el negocio es su principal fuente de sustento por lo que siempre da lo mejor de si para mantenerse en el negocio.

José ha solicitado un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de insumos como cera artificial y marcos de madera con los cuales piensa dar mantenimiento a su negocio. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como apicultor y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José de los Santos is 45 years old, married, and he lives with his wife and children in Caracucho village, Mórrope district, which is a rural area inhabited by humble folk who farm and raise livestock.  It's located just over an hour from the city Chiclayo.

José works as a beekeeper, and he has some hives in a field near his home.  At various times throughout the year, he extracts the honey the bees produce, and he offers it for sell on a monthly basis.  Because this business is his primary source of income, he does all he can to keep it going.

José has requested a loan of 1,000 Nuevos Soles, which he plans to invest in beekeeping supplies such as artificial wax and wooden frames which will be used in his business.  His greatest wish is to continue to advance as a beekeeper and to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for a beekeeping business

loans.name: María Maritza

texts.es:
María Maritza tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos dependientes, vive en el caserío Quemazón, una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope, provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace tres años aproximadamente, ella cría cerdos, pavos, patos y otros animales en diversos ambientes ubicados cerca a su domicilio. Cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentan la zona en donde reside y también en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

María desea realizar algunas mejoras en su negocio, por ello ha creído conveniente realizar arreglos en su corral y comprar alimentos, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Ella es una joven emprendedora y que siempre apoya a su familia. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
María Maritza is 23 years old, single, and has no children.  She lives in the village of Quemazón, a rural area located in the Mórrope district in the province of Lambayeque, more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She has worked raising and selling young animals for about three years.  She raises pigs, turkeys, ducks, and other animals in different areas located close to her home.  When they have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to the merchants that visit the area where she lives and she also sells them in the main market in the city of Chiclayo.

María would like to make some improvements to her business, including repairs to her corral and purchasing animal feed.  In order to meet her goal, she has asked for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

She is a young entrepreneur, and she always supports her family.  People that know María think very highly of her and respect her.

loans.use: Repair corrals and purchase animal feed

loans.name: Maria Gladys

texts.es:
María Gladys es una madre de familia de 24 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el sector Nueve de Octubre, una zona marginal del distrito de Lambayeque, ubicada a más de veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, zapatos y zapatillas desde hace dos años, ella ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece principalmente entre sus vecinos y conocidos. Esta actividad es de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia y gracias a ella ayuda a su esposo con el mantenimiento de la economía diaria.

María desea adquirir mas mercadería para ampliar su negocio y aumentar su nivel de ventas y ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante hogareña y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
María Gladys is the mother of a family. She is 24 years old and lives with her husband and her three children in the sector Nueve de Octubre, in the peripheral zone of the district of Lambayeque. It is located at most twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo. 

She has been working selling items of clothing, shoes and slippers for the past two years. She sells these products on loan more than by cash and sells them mostly to her neighbors and friends. This business is a great help to the family finances and thanks to this, she helps her husband maintain the daily finances. 

María wants to acquire more merchandise to increase her business and her number of sales and profits. For this she has found it advisable to request from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 700 nuevos soles that will help her accomplish her goal.

She is a very family-oriented woman with a great desire to move forward. The people who know her consider her to be a responsible and reliable person.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to grow her clothes selling business.

loans.name: Irma Elena

texts.es:
Irma tiene 57 años de edad, es viuda y reside junto a su familia en el sector Garcés del distrito de José Leonardo O., una zona urbana caracterizada por ser una de las más pobladas de la región, también es una de las más pobres, la mayor parte de su pobladores se encuentran concentrados en zonas urbano marginales.

Se dedica desde hace treinta años a la venta de verduras en el Mercado Moshoqueque, el mercado mayorista de la ciudad, ella adquiere su mercadería de los comerciantes que vienen a dejar sus productos en el mercado, luego los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los comerciantes minoristas. El negocio es una fuente importante de ingresos para su familia por lo que siempre se ha esforzado por mantenerlo.

Irma desea adquirir mas verduras para ampliar su negocio y responder de mejor modo a la demanda con la que cuenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante activa y responsable. Sus conocidos la consideran alguien de confianza y que siempre busca la manera de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Irma is 57 years old and lives with her family in the Garcés sector of José Leonardo O. district, an urban area which is noted for being one of the most densely populated in the region.  It is also one of the poorest.  Most of its residents are concentrated in marginal urban areas.

Irma has been selling vegetables in Moshoqueque market, the city's wholesale market, for thirty years.  She acquires her merchandise from traders who come to leave their products in the market, then she sells them on to the general public and to retail salespeople.  Her business is an important source of income for her family which is why she has always worked hard to maintain it.

Irma would like to acquire more vegetables to expand her business and better respond to the demand which she has.  For this reason she has approached Edpyme Alternativa for a loan in the sum of 1,000 nuevos soles which will help her to achieve her goal.

Irma is quite an active and responsible woman.  Her acquaintances consider her to be a trustworthy woman who is always in search of ways to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy vegetables to expand her sales business in the market

loans.name: Norma Luz

texts.es:
Norma tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en general. Ella ofrece estos productos tanto al crédito como al contado y los ofrece principalmente entre sus vecinos y conocidos. Esta actividad es de mucha ayuda para la economía de su familia y se vale de ella para ayudar al mantenimiento de su economía diaria.

Norma desea adquirir mas mercadería para ampliar su negocio ya que se acercan las fiestas navideñas y durante esta temporada la demanda por su negocio aumenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a realizar su objetivo.

Norma es una joven bastante trabajadora y empeñosa, las personas que le conocen admiran sus ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
texts.en:
Norma is 25 years old, single, and lives with her family in the Olmos district, an agricultural area with a lot of commercial activity in the Lambayeque province, more than an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She sells all types of clothing.  She offers her products on credit and for cash payments and mostly sells to her neighbors and friends.  Her work helps support her family and meets her daily expenses.

Norma would like to acquire more merchandise to expand her store now that the holiday season is approaching and during that time, demand increases.  She has asked for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternative to help her meet her goal.

Norma is a hardworking and enterprising young woman.  People who know her admire her desire to succeed.

loans.use: Purchase clothing to expand her clothing sales business

loans.name: Edith Marielita

texts.es:
Edith es una madre de familia de 32 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo en el sector La Huaca del distrito de Olmos, una zona rural que se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y comercio.

Se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su domicilio, ella ofrece a sus vecinos diversos productos de consumo diario con un trato amable. Debido al tiempo que lleva en el negocio su negocio cuenta con una clientela fija y se vale de el para ayudar a su esposo a sacar adelante a la economía diaria.

Edtih desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1300 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Edith es una mujer bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Las persona que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Edith is 32 and a mother who lives with her husband in La Huaca section of  Olmos district, a rural area of mostly agriculture and business.
She sells general merchandise and groceries from a store in her house.  She sells everyday products to her neighbors in a friendly manner.  Since she has had the business for a while, she has regular customers and she depends on them to help her and her husband  get ahead with their daily expenses.  Edith would like to expand her business with the purchase of more products so that she can fulfill her customers’ needs.  That is why she is requesting a loan of 1300 new soles form Edpyme Alternativa to help achieve her goal.

Edith is a calm and responsible woman and her main objective is to continue growing as an entrepreneur so that she can offer her family a better quality of life.  The people who know her show her great respect and esteem.

loans.use: To buy general merchandise and groceries to expand the products in her store

loans.name: Deysar Delso

texts.es:
Deysar es un joven padre de familia de 21 años de edad, tiene un menor hijo y vive en casa de padres, ubicada en el sector Aviación del distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina), el brinda este servicio en su distrito y siempre cuida de realizarlo de un modo responsable y eficiente. Adicionalmente tiene junto a su madre un pequeño negocio de crianza y comercialización de aves de corral, ganado porcino y vacuno. Los cuales venden a los negociantes que siempre frecuentan la zona en donde reside.

Deysar desea ampliar su negocio de crianza y venta de animales adquiriendo más cerdos, con ello planea satisfacer a la demanda con la que cuenta, la cual se mantiene a la expectativa. Por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles
texts.en:
Deysar is a young father who is 21 years old.  He has a young son and lives in his parents' house which is located in the Aviación sector of Cayalti district.  This is a community which works in commerce, farming and livestock raising.  It is located more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Deysar provides transport services for cargo and passengers in a 'mototaxi' (a motorized vehicle which consists of a motorcyle with a carriage behind it for transporting passengers or cargo).  He provides this service in his district and always makes sure he does so responsibly and efficiently.  In addition, he has a small business together with his mother where he raises and sells poultry, pigs and cattle.  He sells the animals to salespeople who always frequent the area where he lives.

Deysar would like to expand his business raising and selling animals by acquiring more pigs.  He plans to thereby satisfy the demand which he has.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Buy pigs to expand animal husbandry/sales business

loans.name: Judith Odelit

texts.es:
Judith es una madre de familia de 52 años de edad que vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Cayalti, una zona agrícola de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.   

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la venta de productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo, ella cuenta con un grupo de clientes que le compran sus productos con frecuencia, mientras más pedidos le realizan obtiene mas puntos de parte de la empresa que le provee los productos y por consiguiente obtiene mayores ganancias. Por este motivo siempre se esfuerza por obtener cada vez mas clientes.

Judith desea contar con un capital estable para adquirir mas productos y contar con un stock fijo de cosméticos que permita a sus clientes adquirir los productos que necesitan rápidamente y no esperar hasta fin de mes, que es cuando le entregan los pedidos. Por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su meta.

Judith es una mujer trabajadora y que gusta mucho de mantenerse activa, en la zona donde vive es bastante conocida y estimada por sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Judith is a 52 year old mother who lives with her family in Cayalti district, a farming area with a lot of commercial activity, which is located one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Judith has been selling beauty products and cosmetics through a catalog for five years.  She has a group of customers who frequently buy her products.  The more orders her customers make, the more points she gains from the company which provides the products and, therefore, the more profit she makes.  For this reason, Judith is always working hard to attract more customers.

Judith would like to have stable working capital so that she can acquire more products and have a fixed stock of cosmetics which will allow her customers to acquire the products they need quickly instead of having to wait until the end of the month which is when her orders are delivered.  For this reason she has requested a loan for 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve her goal.

Judith is a hard-working woman who really likes to keep herself active.  She is quite well known in her district and is well liked by her neighbors.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to expand her sales business

loans.name: Irma Gabina

texts.es: La Sra. Espinoza requiere el crédito para comprar mercancía he invertir en el negocio de venta de ropa y zapatos por catalogo, ella comenta que en este cambio de temporada que es el invierno la require mayor inversión es por eso solicita el crédito, ella esta pensionada debido a que tiene lastimada su espalda pero eso no le impide que haya creado su nueva fuente de ingresos como comerciante debido a que la pension mensual que obtiene no es suficiente, aparte de que ella es una persona muy activa he independiente y sigue apoyando a sus hijos en lo que puede al igual que a sus nientos con su educación.
texts.en: Mrs Espinoza requires a loan to buy merchandise to invest in her business selling clothes and shoes from a catalog.  She tells us that she needs greater investment now that the season is changing to winter.  This is why she is requesting a loan.  Mrs Espinoza receives a pension because she injured her back but this hasn't stopped her creating a new source of income as a saleswoman because the monthly pension which she receives is not enough.  She is a very active and independent person and she continues supporting her children as much as she can.  She also helps her grandchildren with their education.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Hugo Antonio Alberto

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de padres ubicada en el sector Saltur, una zona que pertenece al distrito de Zaña, se encuentra ubicado a cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de trasporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina) el brinda este servicio a los pobladores de la zona y a los turistas tanto nacionales como extranjeros que pasan por el lugar para allegar al complejo arqueológico Huaca Rajada (lugar donde se encontró al Señor de Sipán). Adicionalmente trabaja como operario de maquinaria pesada, labor que realiza de modo eventual.

Antonio se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la reparación y mantenimiento de su mototaxi. El es un joven bastante responsable y que siempre busca el modo de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Antonio is 23 years old.  He is single and lives in his parents' home in Saltur which is in Zaña district, forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Antonio provides transport services for cargo and passengers in a 'mototaxi' (a motorized vehicle which consists of a motorbike with a carriage on the back).  He provides his services to the area's residents and also to national and international tourists who come to the area to visit the Huaca Rajada archeological complex (the site of Lord Sipán's tomb).  He also works as a heavy machinery operator on a casual basis.

Antonio is requesting a loan for 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use his loan to repair and service his taxi.  He is quite a responsible young man and he is always looking for ways to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To have his mototaxi repaired and serviced

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buying merchandise for her business

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La Sra.  Rosa Maria M., es una persona casada, que vive solo con su esposo, quien trabaja de albañil, sus hijos ya se casaron y todos viven  en otros domicilios, es por esto que la sra. Rosa Maria inicio el negocio de abarrotes y trabaja en una maquiladora por la noche, porque dice que se desespera si no hace nada productivo, y ella  al enterarse de los  creditos que ofrecemos, se animo a tramitar su credito, porque es su interes agrandar la tienda de  abarrotes, pero tambien esta ampliando su casa, ya que tiene piso de tierra y ella no quiere que se le empolven los productos, porque despues dan mal aspecto, por eso le interesa mucho poner el piso lo mas pronto posible y dar una mejor imagen  a los vecinos cuando van a comprar  y que ademas, se les quedara como herencia a los hijos en un futuro y asi ella tendra en que ocuparse, porque dice que ya se siente grande.
texts.en: Mrs Rosa Maria M. is married and lives alone with her husband who works as a builder.  Her children are already married and they all live in their own homes.  This is why Rosa Maria started her grocery business.  She also works in a 'maquiladora' (an assembly plant located on the US-Mexico border) in the evenings.  She does this because she says that she hates not doing anything productive.  When she found out about the loans which we offer, she applied for one because she would like to expand her grocery store.  She is also extending her home because she has a dirt floor and she doesn't want her products to be covered in dust because it looks bad.  For this reason, she would like to put down a solid floor as soon as possible and thereby give her neighbors a better impression when they come to buy from her.  Also, her home is what her children will inherit in the future.

loans.use: To put down a solid floor in the premises where she has her grocery store

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil  casada y tiene 06 hijos (04 dependientes), estudió educación primaria completa.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 01 año, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de animales en general.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  para comprar animales menores.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener más capital y ser ganadera.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
María is a member of the communal bank "Punta Sahuacasi" located in the district of Azángaro, province of Azángaro, department of Puno. She is 44 years old, married and has six children (four dependents). She completed elementary school. 

She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for the past year. Her first loan was for S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, money which she used to increase her business capital for selling animals in general. 

María is requesting a new loan of S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, money which she will invest in buying small animals. 

Her dream for the future is to have more capital and to be a livestock farmer. 

What she likes most about her communal bank is the savings and the trainings.

loans.use: To buy small animals

loans.name: María Natividad

texts.es:
María Natividad es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi”  ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia D. Azángaro, departamento D. Puno, tiene 55 años D. edad, D. estado civil  casada y tiene 05 hijos (04 dependientes), la señora no estudió en ningún centro D. educación.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 18 meses, nos cuenta que su  préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para  incrementar el capital D.  su negocio D. venta D. animales menores especialmente ovejas.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá  para comprar ovejas.

Su sueño para el futuro  es mejorar el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal  son las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
María Natividad is a member of the community bank "Punta Sahaucasi", located in the Azángaro district in the Azángaro province in the department of Puno.  She is 55 yeas old, married, and has five children (four dependent on her).  She has never been to school.

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 18 months.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles, which she used to increase the capital in her business that sells animals, especially sheep.

She is asking for a new loan for 500 nuevos soles which she will use to purchase sheep. 

Her dream for the future is to improve her business.  The thing she likes best about her community bank is the training.

loans.use: Purchase sheep

loans.name: Maria Petronila

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, estudió educación primaria incompleta.

Viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos desde hace 03 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de animales.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero con la que podrá comprar ovejas para su engorde y poder venderlos.

Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar los ganados.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones, y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Punta Sahuacasi” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, in Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.  She is 46 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 2 children.  She didn't complete her primary education.

María has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 3 years.  Her original loan was for 300 nuevos soles and she used the money to increase the working capital of her animal sales business.

She is requesting a new loan for 1,000 nuevos soles which she will use to buy sheep to fatten and then sell.

Her dream for the future is to improve her livestock.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings and what she makes on her savings.

loans.use: To buy sheep to fatten and then sell

loans.name: Maritza Agripina

texts.es:
Maritza es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi” ubicado en el distrito D. Azángaro,  provincia D. Azángaro, departamento D. Puno, tiene 42 años D. edad, D. estado civil  casada y tiene 03 hijos. La señora estudió hasta 5to D. educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 02 años, su primer   préstamo fue D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para  incrementar el capital D.  su negocio D. venta D. abarrotes y animales menores.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma D. S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en mercaderías para su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro es ayudar a que sus hijos sean profesionales, tener un carro y un depósito D. gaseosas.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Maritza is a member of the “Punta Sahuacasi” community bank which is located in Azángaro district, in Azángaro province, in the department of Puno.  She is 42 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She studied up to the fifth year of elementary school.

Maritza has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles and she used that money to increase the working capital of her business selling groceries and young animals.

She is requesting a new loan for 500 nuevos soles to invest in buying merchandise for her business.

Her dreams for the future are to help her children to become professionals, to buy a car and to own a soda warehouse.

What she most likes about her community bank is the punctuality and the responsibility.

loans.use: To invest in buying merchandise for her business

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 32-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is the breadwinner for his family of five. He lives in his own house and his dream is to see his family attain an average standard of living. Joseph is a farmer and has been farming for three years now. He is reaping tangible results. His intention for this loan is to buy fertilizers for his banana plantation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his banana plantation

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en: Tereza is a 53-year-old single mother of five children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her family dream is to educate her children to attain better qualifications. She has been a farmer for over 20 years and she still realizes increased returns despite the problem of pests and diseases. Tereza intends to use the money to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en: Sylvia is a 40-year-old woman, married to a driver with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She lives in a semi-permanent house and is vested with the responsibility of taking care of seven of the household members with the help of her husband. Her family dream is being able to pay school fees for her children up to tertiary institutions. For 12 years now, she has been selling clothes and she has seen tremendous improvement in her income levels amidst challenges of high rent costs and seasonal demands of her customers. Her business dream is to own a boutique. Sylvia intends to buy clothes with the loan extended to her.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha es socia del Banco Comunal “Punta Sahuacasi”  ubicado en el distrito de Azángaro,  provincia de Azángaro, departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil  soltera y tiene 02 hijos, estudió educación superior completa.

Viene  trabajando con  el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos desde hace 03 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizó para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de animales caseros.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le servirá para comprar animales menores especialmente ovejas.

Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital y ser mayorista.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Martha is a member of the community bank "Punta Sahuacasi", located in the Azángaro district in the province of Azángaro and the department of Puno.  She is 29 years old, single, and has two children.  She completed high school.

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles, which she used to increase the capital in her business selling animals.

Now she is asking for a new loan of 1000 nuevos soles to purchase small animals, especially sheep.

Her dream for the future is to have more income and sell products wholesale.  The things she likes best about her community bank are punctuality and saving what she earns.

loans.use: Purchase small animals, especially sheep

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a 30-year-old married, ambitious man with two children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is determined to see that his household members get the minimum socially accepted standards. He is a cyclist and operates a retail shop. He has been in this business for two years. Asked whether he enjoys the business, he proudly defends his decision although he confesses to have challenges in finances due to seasonal customers. Richard intends to use the loan to purchase sugar, cooking oil, soap, and domestic items to sell at a profit.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, cooking oil, soap, and domestic items for selling at a profit.

loans.name: Mari Luz

texts.es:
Mari Luz es socia del Banco Comunal “Sol de Oro” ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca,  provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil  casada y tiene 02  hijos. La señora tiene estudios de educación superior.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 01 año, su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio de venta de productos de belleza.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en los productos de su negocio.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener una tienda de cosméticos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y compartir experiencias.
texts.en:
Mari Luz is a member of the “Sol de Oro” (Golden Sun) community bank which is located in Juliaca district, in San Román district, in Puno department.  She is 31 years old, married, and has 2 children.  She completed her higher education.

Mari Luz has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 1 year.  Her first loan was for 500 nuevos soles which she used to increase the working capital of her business selling beauty products.

She is requesting a new loan for 300 nuevos soles to invest in products for her business.

Her dream for the future is to have a cosmetics store.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings and the sharing of experiences.

loans.use: To invest in products for her business

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” ubicado en el distrito Cabanilla,  provincia de Lampa, departamento de Puno, tiene 52 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 01 hijo independiente, la señora estudió hasta 5to de educación primaria.

Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 03 años, nos cuenta que su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de animales caseros.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar ovejas.

Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar su negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones porque intercambian palabras entre todas las socias.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Mujeres Triunfadoras” (Triumphant Women) community bank which is located in Cabanilla district, in Lampa province, in the department of Puno.  She is 52 years old, married, and has 1 grown-up child.  She studied up to the 5th year of elementary school.

María has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 3 years.  She tells us that her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles and she used it to increase the working capital of her business selling domestic animals.

She is requesting a new loan for 1,000 nuevos soles to buy sheep.

Her dream for the future is to improve her business.

What she most likes about her community bank are the meetings because all the members talk to each other.

loans.use: To invest in buying sheep

loans.name: Salim

texts.en: Salim is a 52-year-old married man with 12 children living in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda who is longing to see all his children independent from him. He is a mechanic and has been in service for 20 years, which has enabled him to educate his children and sustain the family. His business goal is to extend his services to most of the urban centers in the district. Salim intends to use the loan to buy spare parts to sell.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts to sell

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina es socia del Banco Comunal “Brisas de Rio Blanco” ubicado en el distrito de Pilcuyo, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 28 años de edad, estado civil soltera y sin hijos, tiene grado de instrucción de primaria completa.
Marina tiene una actividad que consiste en la compra y venta de queso y pescado (trucha), estos productos son llevados desde Ilave a la región de Tacna. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, el primer préstamo recibido fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permito incrementar el capital de su negocio. 
La señora  solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 2500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitirá aumentar la mercadería  de su negocio.
Su sueño es  progresar en su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Marina is a member of the “Brisas de Rio Blanco” community bank which is located in Pilcuyo district, in Collao province, in Puno department.  She is 28 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She didn't finish her primary education.

Marina has a business buying and selling cheese and fish (trout).  These products are transported from Ilave to the region of Tacna.  She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles which allowed her to increase her business capital.

She is requesting a new loan for 2,500 nuevos soles to increase her business merchandise.

Her dream is to make progress in her business.  What she most likes about her community bank is the responsibility.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise

loans.name: Maria Bartolome

texts.es:
María es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito de Capachica, provincia de Puno, Departamento dePuno, tiene 71 años de edad, de estado civil viuda, con siete hijos y con grado de instrucción analfabeta.
Viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace siete años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/.300. 00 nuevos soles, dinero que le permitió  incrementar la mercadería de su negocio de venta de abarrotes y gaseosas.
La señora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 2000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio. 
Su sueño  es ampliar la mercadería de su negocio.
Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la ganancia generada por el ahorro.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “San Salvador” community bank which is located in Capachica district, in Puno province, Puno department.  María is 71 years old.  She is a widow and has seven children.  She is illiterate.

María has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for seven years.  Her first loan was for 300 nuevos soles.  She used this money to increase the merchandise of her business buying and selling groceries and soda.

She is requesting a new loan for 2,000 nuevos soles which she will use to increase her business capital.

Her dream is to expand her business' merchandise.

What she most likes about her community bank is the interest which she makes on her savings.

loans.use: To increase her business capital

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es socia del  Banco Comunal “San Salvador”, ubicado en el distrito D. Capachica, provincia D. Puno, Departamento D. Puno, tiene 74 años D. edad,  estado civil casada, con seis hijos y grado D. instrucción analfabeta.
Su actividad consiste en la venta D. queso, quinua y huevo, en las diferentes ferias del lugar y en Arequipa. Ella viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace diez años, el primer préstamo solicitado que fue D. S/.300. 00 nuevo soles, le permitió iniciar con su negocio.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo D. S/ 1200.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital D. su negocio. 
Su sueño  es seguir con su negocio.
Lo  que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son todas las actividades que se realiza en la reunión.
texts.en:
